name: The Dream is Coming...
description: Basically, it will be a story of memories of a high school circle of 5 people and a very mysterious girl who changed Yoshiro's outlook on life. During the game, Yoshiro will find the students' things and tell interesting stories and learn about some of the problems the students are hiding.....

name: Project CARS 3: Electric Pack
description: Get to grips with 4 of the world’s quickest electric vehicles - the 2020 Porsche Taycan Turbo S, the record-breaking 2020 Volkswagen ID.R, the 2020 Audi AI:RACE concept and the NIO EP9. Own the future with the Project CARS 3: Electric Pack.

name: The Alchemist Alekki
description: This is a game about running a potion shop and saving time! Alekki has been accused of creating a potion that caused areas of time to merge together. Help her uncover the truth by defeating powerful Echoes of time in different Time-Warped areas.

name: BunnyShot
description: Play as an Easter bunny, score points and save chickens using Easter eggs in BunnyShot!

name: Small Press Tycoon
description: The original DIY publishing adventure sim

name: Last Standing
description: Last standing is a game that combines puzzle elements that remove elemental blocks and indulging girls' stories. Grow yourself by playing. Also, please release the girls' cravings with the items you collected.

name: Adventure War: Battlefield
description: The kingdom of Rotonis is under attack and it's up to you to defend the kingdom. Level up your character and unlock powerful abilities to defeat your foes on the battlefield. Help the locals by completing quests and bring peace back to the kingdom.

name: Sacred Cubes 2
description: A logic game with many exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: The Frog Game
description: Welcome! Keep jumping and NEVER STOP to find your own limitation! Or you might achieve your goal and feel a sense of accomplishment! Which one will you be?

name: Winter
description:
There's something about yourself that you can't live with. Some part you think abhorrent, to be hidden away from sight.

It's not a good absence.

You've told yourself you feel better. But you don't really believe that, do you?

-

WINTER is an interactive fiction about sex, trans insecurity, and a girl with a skull for a face.

name: Happy Z-Day
description: Today is supposed to be your daughter's birthday, But something happened in this town. Almost everyone has turn into a Monster. You need to protect your daughter and her birthday party!

name: Sophie's Safecracking Simulator
description: Crack simulated safe locks using real techniques!

name: Aviano
description: Aviano is an exploration game from other worlds, where the player plays an archaeologist who wants to solve a mystery! And it will take him to fly with his hang glider in other ways, challenging your pilot skills until the end of each level. The controls are easy to understand but skill based, the physics-based flight model. It offers a realistic flight experience, similar to a real flying wing, am with higher speeds to entertain and give speed sensations to the player…

name: Blade Flash Death
description: Control your samurai by manipulating the timeline. Be diligent with each movement you make. When ready, press play and watch the scene unfold. If you've thought-out your movements carefully, you will be the last samurai standing.

name: Out Bike the Tsunami
description: A giant tsunami is coming!!! Help Ian bike to his safety.

name: Sumotori Dreams Classic
description: Heavy headed blocky guys sumo wrestle and tumble around.

name: Planets Battle
description: Battles of space ships.

name: Tower of Wishes
description: Tower Of Wishes is a family friendly, fun Match 3. The game also includes mini games such as Hidden Object, Find Differences, Chain Solitaire and Sliders for that bit of extra fun!

name: Deva: The Haunted Game
description: Deva: Second-Person Perspective Game is here! Discover a new type of gameplay and a new kind of fear!

name: Classic Checkers
description: Classic Checkers is an engaging checkers game that helps you enjoy a realistic, fun gameplay of this extraordinary board game. The visuals are extraordinary, and you can also see the current score right away. It's also possible to rotate the board if you want for the best results and experience. You can play Classic Checkers against an AI that has multiple difficulties. It's also possible to play PVP against your friends if you want.

name: Sonic Omens
description:
This fan game tells the story of why chaos emeralds are no longer used in recent Sonic games. What events took place after Sonic Unleashed before Sonic Lost World, which prevents the characters from using chaos emeralds?

What secrets do the temples of Chaos Emeralds hide?

name: Bone Mayhem
description: Bone Mayhem is a first person shooter versus waves of enemies, where player can apply modifications to weapon and active abilities.

name: Yogurt Commercial 3
description: Yogurt Commercial 3 is a sandbox puzzle adventure game where the player controls a fresh new yogurt commercial actor. You must travel the world amassing power in order to create the ultimate yogurt commercial of all time in this sandbox puzzle adventure game.

name: 7Days Origins
description: Every choice you make will change your story. Every small choice will change your relationships with comrades, and change your fate and those of your comrades at critical moments. You may be the villain, or a trustworthy comrade. Everything depends on your choices.

name: ComPressure
description: Design increasingly complex computation units powered by high pressure steam. Each completed design can be used in future levels.

name: Eternia: Pet Whisperer
description:
Tired of the daily churn at the office, only to come home to an empty apartment? The Rainbow Dome shelter will help you find the perfect partner to spice up your life! Take a plunge into our exotic selection of pets, and you'll surely find the piece of you you've always been missing!

Inspired by Hatoful Boyfriend and the team’s love of animals, Eternia: Pet Whisperer is a short visual novel that sees you venture to a local deluxe animal shelter to find a companion to cure your loneliness. What ensues is a week you’ll never forget.

name: Touhou Kouryuudou: Unconnected Marketeers
description: Touhou Kouryuudou: Unconnected Marketeers is the eighteenth official installment of the Touhou Project. It was announced by ZUN on the Touhou Project news blog Touhou Yomoyama News, February 2021. A playable demo is scheduled for release on March 21st the same year, at Reitaisai 18, and the full version is scheduled to be released in May.

name: North Town
description: Conquer the icy lands and build the most magnificent city of the North! Admire the vivid scenery, meet the gods and interact with the locals. Become the master of economy, develop your settlement, and rule the North Town!

name: Cubekiller
description: CubeKiller is a 3D Indie third-person singleplayer game that allows you to fight and survive, unravel and shape your own story in CubeKiller

name: Soup Boy Goes to the Soup Convention
description: The Soup Convention is in town. Can you win the soup eating contest?

name: Epitaph: Soutai no Aitai
description: Windy and Dokuo go on a journey through various isekai as dimension-hopping heroes, facing a different Demon King each time.

name: Stroggman's Tundra
description: Stroggman's Tundra is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: Chamber.Repeat();
description: Chamber.Repeat(); is a small 2D puzzle game where the level always changes. Just like Andy Warhol's "Campbell Soup's", some elements shift and change while you have to reach the finish over and over again, getting more difficult with more and more chamber elements.

name: Lo-Fi Lounge
description: A lounge for meeting others and vibing out to live Lofi and Retrowave.

name: Jungle Rumble
description: Jungle Rumble is a game about a brave soldier who tries to restore order in the deep wilds of the Amazon by destroying the army of the evil Skull!

name: Water Drift
description:
Control your boat, as you drift along the track, the stronger and longer the turn, the more points you get! Drive the entire distance gaining as many points as possible.
Reach the finish line as quickly as possible!

name: The Luffeltera Renovator
description: The Luffeltera Renovator is a repair craft simulation game that completes a large-scale repair of the magic tower of the forest (commonly known as the light blue tower). Regain the brilliance of the decaying magic tower! Collect and craft materials! Sell it, fix it, and cultivate it! Let's complete a large-scale renovation once every 100 years with our friends!

name: Cursed Blocks
description: Cursed Blocks is a block-stacking game in which the game messes with you. It was built by a competitive block-stacking player with the primary goal of offering a new, refreshing, tough-but-fair challenge to those with a mastery of the basic block-stacking games.

name: Jetboy
description: Jetboy is a retro supercharged pixel jetpacking shooter with a pumping metal soundtrack.

name: Jump Out
description:
Jump Out is a brand new Commodore 64 game.

Jump off all tiles in 30 different puzzles.

Jump Out has a password system to load already played levels. Password for the puzzle is given at the start of the level.

name: Year 2088 Classic
description:
Are you ready for the cyberpunk craze of 2088? flying cars and robots.

Are you ready to see a real cyberpunk craze at the peak of the great pre-war technology in 2088? In Year 2088 Classic, you can drive flying cars and flying motorcycles, and fight invading AI robots. You can also see the entertainment venues in Dream City and Dark City and wander the streets of the future as a tourist. All it takes to experience all these great adventures is a mobile phone and download this app.

name: Year 2088
description:
Are you ready to experience the peak of the cyberpunk age in 2088?

In 2088, when mankind was at the height of the cyberpunk age, there was a great war and destruction in the world. The earth turned into a radiation barren desert, and some of the survivors settled in virtual worlds on outer space. See people trying to live with the limited technology taken from the world. With the Year 2088 game, you can experience a real cyberpunk life in the orbit of the moon, one of the biggest of these space tops.

name: Submachine
description: A brand new map for Duke Nukem 3D (requiring EDuke32) with a hi-tech theme. The map will mostly focus on solving puzzles, clever minigames, nonlinear gameplay progression and lots of secrets to explore, thus requiring the player to think logically rather than just rely on their reflexes and combat skills.

name: Halls of the Void
description: Medium-sized metal cathedral in the void. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with a custom music track. The map source is included.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - UK Creators
description: UK Creators is the 2.5nd chapter of Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Game Cafe Escape
description: Game Cafe Escape is another room escape game from masasgames. This time you have to solve puzzles and escape from a beautifully designed game cafe.

name: Devil’s Propose
description: A dark romance fantasy otome.

name: Slash of Sword 2
description:
You were accused of a crime you did not commit and were sent to fight in the arena as punishment. Bloody and tactical fights for survival of varying complexity with many rivals await you. Try to learn skills to become more proficient, as well as explore locations and interact with characters to achieve justice!
Will you try to make decisions about whether to help a wounded man who was recently a bandit and robbed ordinary travelers? Whether to tell the owner about the treasure you found? Or maybe whether to let the girl go with the robber who kidnapped her, or deal with him and return the girl to her father? You decide…

name: Mahjong School
description:
"Mahjong School" is a beautiful girl + eliminate mahjong leisure game.
Players should find out three same mahjong cards in the game and eliminate them, but it should be noted that they will occupy the grid before finding them together!

name: New Super Abandoned: Discovery Island
description: New Super A:DI VI.0 DX: Director's Cut DELUXE: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Found 2021 Revision 3 feat. Dante from the Devil May Cry series Final Mix Redux with New Funky Mode - A Fragmentary Passage and Knuckles Remastered (otherwise simply known as New Super Abandoned: Discovery Island) is a semi-serious self-parodying April Fools' update to Abandoned: Discovery Island. Taking place in a separate continuity, the game features a mixture of improvements and additions, as well as joke additions and changes. This version is planned to receive updates as well as the DLC feature that were intended to be added to R1 and the original game, though it is not planned to entirely replace it at the moment nor will it be the game's last iteration.

name: Al Rocío
description:
Come to Al Rocío, the first Rocio Brotherhood simulator that lets you travel around Andalusia and visit the Rocio Journey.

Enjoy the experience that is the Rocio Journey, create your own Brotherhood, manage resources, make it grow, gear up and make all your pilgrims arrive at the Almonte village and find the White Dove!

name: Divimera
description: Divimera is an adult visual novel/dating sim game with point-and-click and sandbox gameplay. It is set in a Victorian fantasy world inspired by the work of H.P. Lovecraft and contains strong language, some elements of horror and a lot of pornographic images and animations.

name: Cipher Island
description:
Cipher Island is a cybersecurity educational game.

The great Captain Cipherbeard has sent you on a mission to find his buried treasure across three treacherous islands. The player must use Cryptography to decode ciphers that disclose the treasure's whereabouts.

name: Kuzgakai's Dungeon
description: One day you receive a message from your friend, but it was so strange... that night something happened. the Nightmare becomes real... or It was just another dream?... What would you do if your worst nightmare becomes an arcade?... Are you ready to face it? Are you ready to pay for your murder?

name: More Bones Than You Can Count
description: Explore a mysterious graveyard and its secrets before your time runs out. But be wary — not everything is as it seems.

name: Tokyo purgatorio
description: Tokyo purgatorio is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to explore Ginji Suzumoto's dream and collect Lines (Effects).

name: KoboldAI
description: Ever wondered what an infinitely generated world would look like? Always feel limited by the imagination of the developers? KoboldAI is the open-source alternative to AI Dungeon and NovelAI, focussing on you as the player and the AI as the Dungeon Master. With new AI models constantly being released by the community, you are always guaranteed to have a new and unique experience in the field of text-based dungeon delving.

name: Snow-Swept Quest
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Saya is stranded on an unfamiliar continent, surrounded by all manner of dangers. Will she make it home?

name: Fallen London: Leviathan
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for May, 2021.

name: Tomb of Trials
description: A third-person puzzle-action-platformer where players must escape a mysterious deadly tomb by solving puzzles involving a variety of different types of switches, making use of found objects and more. There are also segments that challenge the player's dexterity where they will have to be weary of deadly traps including spikes, flames, trapdoors, bottomless pits, swinging balls, and more.

name: Pico Night Punkin'
description: A low-res demake of Friday Night Funkin' made in PICO-8

name: Welcome to Hell
description: A not specifically difficult in terms of mechanics platformer game, but the mechanics are pushed to their limits to make your life a living hell the entire time playing.

name: Dungeon Raiders
description:
Welcome to Dungeon Raiders! A roguelike dungeon crawler game with collectible cards to acquire and loot to find!
Make your way through perilous dungeons, battle monsters with cards and outfit your heroes with the best armour and weapons you find along the way. Any extra loot you find can be sold in your customizable shop for profit! Use your coins to buy better cards, shop improvements and extra heroes to bring along for the journey.
Complete quests to progress through the game to unlock new dungeon levels with greater challenges, stronger monsters and rarer treasure!
Play your cards right to beat monsters who also each have their own unique cards to play against you with different effects and abilities. Mix and match 40+ of your own unique cards that you can collect along the journey to find the best mix of tactics for winning battles.
Start with a small shop to sell extra loot to the local island citizens and use in game coins to expand, buy equipment and decorations to improve your shop rating and attract more customers.

name: Yellow or Red?
description: Make split second decisions as you jump the ball up as far as you can go while asking yourself, Yellow or Red?

name: Slime Kingdom: An Unlikely Adventure!
description: An adventure with the most unlikeliest of heroes. Gather support from unexpected places as you journey through an expansive, episodic story, full of cheesy humor, quirky characters, monologuing villains and TROPES. Many, many tropes!

name: Hentai GIF Puzzle
description: A Relaxing GIF puzzle game which make you happy

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Variety Pack 17
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: MahjongSchool
description: "MahjongSchool" is a beautiful girl + eliminate mahjong leisure game. Players should find out three same mahjong cards in the game and eliminate them, but it should be noted that they will occupy the grid before finding them together!

name: Deadly Daycare VR
description: Deadly Daycare is a VR experience where you must take care of a cast of chaotic creatures before they destroy you and your daycare!

name: Jivitam
description: Jivitam allows you to experience life of a common man from beginning to end of his life in an interesting way.

name: The Moon 2050
description: Become a brave astronaut and save the galaxy. In this Sci-fi RPG, the protagonist, Harry, crashes and loses his best friend. He learns that Black Hole Inc. and the Professor, who wants to replace all living things with AI, is behind it. Harry will have to form a team and stop the Professor.

name: Dragon VR
description: See the dragon at arm's length, ride on its back, feel the speed of the flight and hear the flapping of dragon’s wings! All these sensations can become real in Dragon VR game.

name: Sinking Inn
description: A small, lonely boy on a hopeful quest navigates through a dark and dreary motel. Dive into its mysterious, eerie atmosphere and find your way through the motel's strange puzzles, as it becomes increasingly clear that reality is not as it seems.

name: Escalation VR!
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Pirate King
description: Become a villainous space pirate. Aim for the Pirate King! Customize your space battleship. Attack passenger ships, rob cargo ships, and defeat guards! Japanese indie games

name: The Tales of Redbox: An Escape From Desire
description: A rail shooter thriller that will put your mouse flicks to the test.

name: Dead Night
description: Dead Night - is a simple and incredibly hardcore 3D shooter where you have to fight to various monsters alone.

name: Gravelbox: The Sandbox
description:
Gravelbox is a 2D sandbox game made in Unity that allows you to make anything with the tools supplied to you.
It was inspired by games like People Playground, Garry's Mod, And MaD2.

name: How We Know We're Alive
description: A free hour long melancholy, point-and-click narrative mystery set in the bible belt of Sweden.

name: Industrious
description: A turn-based mode strategy game 100% coded in Python. As the leader of a mining expedition, you must build a colony, gather resources, craft equipment, trade at the marketplace and fund research to complete your mission objectives. The maps and in-game economy are procedurally generated, which grants a different experience in each playthrough.

name: Murder at Midnight
description: A multiplayer murder-mystery party game where you play as a prey or a predator.

name: Cuckold Simulator
description: CUCKOLD SIMULATOR, the exciting new game where you play as Cuckold (that is his name) in his day-to-day life. Work hard, give all your money to the bull, and be verbally abused by your fat wife.

name: Squeaky Clean
description: Squeaky Clean is an indie horror game set in the shower. Experience the fate of those who come across the urban legend known as the Shower Slasher as you enjoy some hot shower tunes.

name: Spaceball
description: Did you ever wonder what sports would be like in space? This dynamic multiplayer game will have you on the edge of your seat for hours! Mixing elements of rugby and basketball with the low gravity of the moon, you can work as a team to score goals against your opponents. Tackle, grapple, and shoot your way to victory!

name: Scavengers
description:
Scavengers is your strategic survival battleground. Enter a free-to-play action shooter where squads of three compete to survive and dominate in a hybrid of sandbox-style PVE and class-based PVP. Choose from a roster of adaptive Explorers, arm yourself with a combination of unique abilities and weapons, and conquer the challenges of a hostile wasteland. Outthink and outfight enemy players and the dwellers of the frozen Earth.

Scavengers was shut down on December 16, 2022, and is no longer online. The game is no longer available on either the Steam or Epic Games storefronts.

name: Shadow and Flame
description:
2 new factions, new heroes, spells and units for original factions, new maps, and campaign-compatible. Shadow and Flame is a modern reimagining of BFME1, with improved graphics and new gameplay systems.

Shadow and Flame has 6 factions to choose from; the 4 factions from the original game - Gondor, Rohan, Mordor and Isengard - have been overhauled with new mechanics, units, heroes and spells, and 2 new custom factions - Gundabad and Rivendell - have been added.

The goal is to create an RTS experience that is faithful to the spirit of Tolkien's mythos, with diverse, engaging, and balanced gameplay.

name: Sonic The Hedgehog: Electro Block
description: Sin descripción

name: Another Adventure in NSMBU
description: It features four new worlds and a retextured world map, alongside custom music, tilesets, backgrounds, and much more.

name: Golf Impact
description:
Clash against competitors and enjoy fast 1:1 PvP matchmaking.
Dynamic ball trajectory due to in-game weather!
Beautiful and realistic graphics and courses.
Championships where great prizes await!

name: Returnal: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Returnal is a 2021 roguelike third-person shooter video game developed by Housemarque and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

It follows Selene Vassos, an astronaut who lands on the planet Atropos in search of the mysterious "White Shadow" signal and finds herself trapped in a time loop.

After crash-landing on a shape-shifting alien planet, Selene finds herself fighting tooth and nail for survival. Every time she’s defeated, the player is forced to restart the journey.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Main game
- Electropylon Driver weapon
- Hollowseeker weapon
- One Reflex Stimulant
- One Adrenaline Booster
- One Pulsating Mass artefact
- PSN avatars for PS5
- Digital soundtrack

name: Nicole's Risky Job
description: A parody of The Amazing World Of Gumball, featuring Nicole Watterson starting an online erotic stream. Play as her and manage the stream to secure the money $$$

name: MyFloppy Online!
description: Design your Floppy avatar, customize your room, battle, rob and visit other Floppys online!

name: Holo Dungeon
description: Play as Hololive's ace detective Amelia WATson as she investigates the kingdom of Chicago in search of mythical creatures.

name: Island Farmer
description: Farms are set up in islands over calm and clear water. In this tiny fantasy experience, that is easy to do and very relaxing, just like a 3D jigsaw puzzle. Carefully observe the island, try to memorize it, then shuffle the blocks. Swap blocks to reproduce the desired island and it will compose the archipelago. There is no time limit, no logic challenges, nor resources to manage, so you can calmly just focus on the core mechanics while listening to a soothing soundtrack.

name: Lifelike
description: Runaway appliances and a magical mystery!

name: Flags For Friends
description:
What do an excitable asexual pirate, a cultured genderqueer vampire, and a lesbian bird who may be at an important decision point in her life all have in common? They're all your friends, and they're all counting on you to make an absolute banger of a flag for them!

In Flags for Friends, you play as a queer artist in a post-scarcity era and make custom pride flags for -- wait for it -- friends!

name: Goblin.Life
description: Imagination with friends. Forge playable 3D worlds in real time, script them with astral Glyphs, and fill them with adorable Goblins.

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout - Act 2
description: A whimsical puzzle-adventure game set in the world of the bestselling Redwall books. In this second episode, fresh off your defeat of the murderous Scumsnout, you wake to hear the sounds of battle - and must make your way into the fray to find your lost beloved!

name: Seek Girl VIII
description: This is a strategy adventure game. The player needs to help the boy find the safest route to rescue the girl.

name: Bridge to Another World: Endless Game - Collector's Edition
description: These enchanting worlds can be deadly…

name: Castle Itter: The Strangest Battle of WWII
description: The Battle for Castle Itter is a solitaire card driven tabletop boardgame.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears Oh My! 2: Return to Kale Bay
description: There's a whole world of weird and wild anthro animals and scaly dragons out there to discover!

name: Hoverflow
description: Surf, jump, climb and keep your flow in this first-person platformer while finding secrets and beating time trials !

name: Penimorta
description: You are a Wizard. Being imprisoned in Penimorta, a maximum security prison, has little appeal. Naturally, you've decided to bust out. The problem is... between every floor of Penimorta is a Corporeal Beast. Can you escape?

name: Ahri and Bear
description: Ahri and Bear is a 3D puzzle adventure game, where players will take control of Ahri the cat and Bear the dog who embark on an emotional journey together to find their true home. Use Ahri and Bear's unique abilities to navigate through the daunting human world so they can find their way back home.

name: R-Type Final 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition contains the full game, soundtrack, art book, and the R-Type Final 2 Stage Pass, which includes DLC Set 1, 2, and 3. Altogether they consist of a variety of new stages.

name: Crystal Rider
description: Crystal Rider is a 2d platformer with elements of a system of traps and exercises for each level, at each level there are more traps and dangers, difficulty on the level and a variety of obstacles.

name: Hentai Breakout City
description: Welcome to Hentai Breakout City, an Indie game based on the classic Breakout.

name: Bus stop in the fog
description: A bus trip is a journey not a destination. You bought your first sailing boat with your savings of the last 5 years and you find yourself stranded on an island in the Bermuda sea. You must take a very scary bus ride to get off the island ... but will the bus take you off the island?

name: The OmniGallery
description: The OmniGallery is a VR multiverse of art exhibits

name: A long Time
description: Explore an abstract World of Clocks in this short First Person Platformer game. Can be completed in 10 Minutes.

name: The Legend of Bear: Truck Trucker
description: The physics bear driving stacking hauling trading game

name: Click Quest
description: Click Quest is an erotic adventure clicker, with 4 beautiful naked girls in different poses. With awesome 2D animation, this is a must play!

name: ArcticBoy: The Interactive Story
description: A touching story of a young programmer Alexey. One day he meets a girl through a joke site, but who would have thought that Alexei would not be laughing at all. Take a pack of sushi rolls, saddle a snowmobile and go on a long journey to your princess.

name: My Dear Prince
description: A sweet and light yuri story about an airheaded daydreamer and a tomboy set on a quaint Japanese island filled with cute bunnies.

name: Mini Island: Summer
description: Mini Island: Summer is one small hold & gun, boss rush mini-game of casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush mini-game!

name: Little Party Legends
description: Matchmake with other randoms or invite your friends to compete in alot of different minigames. Unlock alot of cool stuff with in game currency.

name: Hella Dazzling Hell!!
description: 龙皇社东方同人作品第三作LH03-东方十昊狱！ 本游戏是一款2D横板的东方project二次同人动作RPG游戏，拥有宏大的叙事和独具特色的武器合成/组装系统，玩家将扮演救灾小队穿行于幻想乡各处，探索隐藏的秘宝并调查异变的成因。

name: 述梦
description: 述梦 is a first-person 3D game that combines word puzzle solving with survival. You will search for supplies to survive on a cursed island and explore the memories of the dead and free their souls.

name: 此刻探索中
description: Sin descripción

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 1
description: Includes 2 new stages.

name: Dragon Break Classic
description: Dragon Break Classic is an arcade game that lets the user break pixel fantasy characters with a unique shield paddle and ball. Unique animated fantasy pixel levels, Mini-Bosses and powerups to collect while you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to play in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player retro-arcade fun!

name: I Am the Prosecutor: No Evidence? No Problem!
description: I Am The Prosecutor is a non-linear visual novel about defending a cute tomboy named Sophie where you're given just 30 seconds to make the right choice each time. Help make Sophie's case against her abusive mother and give her much needed closure.

name: Holostar Command: Quantum Alliance
description: Holostar Command is a fast-paced shooter game that brings Classic Mid-20th Century Space Arcade Games into the 21st Century and right into your living room! Today's tech, Virtual, Mixed & Augmented Realities, with a little nostalgia tossed in to honor the games we loved from days gone by...

name: The Bits That Saved the Galaxy
description: Grab up to three friends for a lo-fi, bit blasting adventure! Fight your way through unique worlds and play styles to save the galaxy!

name: Inferno: Beyond the 7th Circle
description: Grid-Based First Person Dungeon Crawler with survival elements. It's inspired by classic cRPG from the 90s. An old-school game for hardcore players.

name: Ultimate Demolition
description: This is a challenging leisure puzzle game. Players need to make all the balls reach the target point in a limited time, so as to stop the countdown of the time bomb.

name: Cosmica
description: A strategic sci-fi rogue-lite deck building game, with unique storytelling and strategic elements.

name: NinMaki
description: This is different from the general ninja game, because you will play a "ninegg", a novice ninja. There are so few skills that you can't even attack the enemy!? Take advantage of everything around you, avoid a lot of killing, collect broken scrolls, and challenge the final BOSS.

name: The Last Town: Excape
description: The Last Town Is a first person shooter, tower defense, strategy, survival in one of the independent game.Using equipment to resist the corpses, more than 20 guns, accessories, consumables, mountable defenses were designed for the game, and a real physics engine was used to simulate reality

name: Puzzle Light
description: Swap the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

name: Angry Space Bees
description: Fight against space bees in the endless space teeming with alien opponents.

name: 冒险时光机
description: A 2D horizontal board gameGame mechanism: players can freely switch between melee and long-range attacks to defeat NPC.This game adopts retro pixel stylePlayer operation: A: move left; D: move right; space: jump; J: normal attack; K: skill attack (prerequisite)

name: Crossbow Crusade
description: You are the legendary monster hunter on a mission to survive the slaughter through the Dead Kingdom. Armed only with a trusty crossbow and old-fashioned trench coat, you have to reach the bowels of a dying country riddled with hordes of blood-soaking monsters. These scoundrels have to be hunted down! In Crossbow Crusade you will have everything needed from instant platforming classics — challenging enemies, hard and rewarding fight system, 90’s-style pixel art and responsive controls. All these features make for a great platforming experience suitable for new gamers and genre veterans alike!

name: Jigsaw Tetra
description: More than just another puzzle game. Jigsaw Tetra highlights the fun part of puzzle-solving. Jigsaw mode: Do you like solving jigsaws? Jigsaw Tetra gives you the perfect opportunity to taste that experience on your Nintendo Switch. Tetra mode: Who does not love the good old 'Tetris'-style mechanics? With “Tetra Mode”, the jigsaw is now tetra-saw! Try out Tetra to find out the perfect combination between jigsaw style and 'Tetris'-style games. Features: Up to 256 puzzle pieces. Compete with your friends in versus mode. Compete with the AI. Collect all the stars for each level. Lots of images you can choose from. Music from various genres. Exercise your brain power while having fun!

name: Mafia Slots
description: Free Spins, Free Mini Game! Come join the gang in this mafia themed slot game. Test your luck with up to 9 lines of betting. Classic and easy to use gameplay perfect for slot lovers.

name: Xeno Shooter
description: Xeno Shooter is a action shooter arena game! You play as a space cadet who travels to Andromeda with the mission of defeating the Primordials and thus, achieving a new home for humanity.

name: Arcana Heart 3 Lovemax Sixstars!!!!!! Xtend
description: Arcana Heart 3 Lovemax Sixstars!!!!!! Xtend, the free update for Arcana Heart 3 Lovemax Sixstars!!!!!! It includes 2 new playable characters (as paid DLC), a new Arcana, 2 new stages, and an upgraded 16:9 aspect ratio.

name: Decaying Delicacy
description: Collect keys to unlock gates to get those delicious delicacies while avoiding strange threats in a 2.5D arcade collection game, or at least that's the game some of the time. Read your diary, or don't. The game has several different endings based on your performance, and a number of alternative paths based on your choices and how you're doing.

name: ICE Temple
description:
Slide into the cave and explore all the rooms to discover many puzzles !

This temple also hide a mysterious chest but noone knows exactly what it contains.

Each time you want to move, you will slide on the floor until you reach an obstacle. But be careful, your body temperature will slowly go down... And if you reach 0 : it's over !

Don't worry, there are several coffee bottles on your path to warm up your body and keep you safe !

Play levels and make your owns

More than 40 levels and a mysterious secret
Available on PC and Android
Create your own caves with the level editor
Share your levels with your friends
Play it live with your community with the Twitch extension !

name: Ben 10 Bundle
description:
Enjoy both games from the series Ben 10!

Included in this bundle are:

Ben 10
It’s Hero Time!
As Ben Tennyson, it’s up to you to save the world. Take on some of Ben’s most infamous enemies, including Zombozo, Queen Bee, and the Weatherheads. Unlock and transform into all ten of Ben’s incredible alien forms. Discover an exciting new story and use each alien’s unique combat moves to defeat enemies, solve fun puzzles and save the day.

Ben 10: Power Trip
Evil Hex has cursed Europe – and only Ben 10 can stop him! Explore a 3D world filled with combat, puzzles and secrets as you save the day!

name: Terminator: Resistance Enhanced - Collector's Edition
description:
Run and gun or sneak and hack through Skynet's defenses! Interact with a motley group of survivors and change their fates!
Get under the skin of the iconic T-800 series Infiltrator and strike out against Resistance forces with the new infiltrator mode.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- SteelBook case
- Mini Hardcover Comic
- 4x A6 Postcards
- Presented in a Collector's Box

name: Terminator: Resistance Enhanced
description:
Run and gun or sneak and hack through Skynet's defenses! Interact with a motley group of survivors and change their fates!
Get under the skin of the iconic T-800 series Infiltrator and strike out against Resistance forces with the new infiltrator mode.

name: Gob
description: A pixel-based platformer featuring a classic RPG slime, Gob, lost in a dangerous world. While being pursued by a supposed "Hero", Gob must jump, slide, dodge and bounce his way through dangerous terrain in order to get back home safely.

name: Mamiya
description: Mamiya is a captivating, dark visual novel in which a group of young men struggle against existential dread before the end of the world.

name: Genesis
description:
The year is 2120, Earth has been attacked by an evil AI - GENESIS. One single fighter has broken through the ferocious siege, fight your way through hordes of enemies to reach the main processor of Genesis and destroy it.

The future of mankind depends on you...

Test your agility to dodge enemy fire and collect shield energy and power-ups from enemy remains. Make your way through 4 action packed levels and beat each boss to reach the main processor.

name: R-Type Final 2: Inaugural Flight Edition
description: R-Type Final 2: Inaugural Flight Edition includes the official soundtrack, art book and a collector's book.

name: Rodent and Plank: Secret Origin
description: Rodent and Plank is a run 'n gun action platformer that borrows heavily from genre classics such as Gunstar Heroes, Earthworm Jim, and Metal Slug. It's tough as nails and the constantly shifting gameplay styles ensures that there's a surprise around every corner.

name: Returnal
description:
Returnal is a 2021 roguelike third-person shooter video game developed by Housemarque and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

It follows Selene Vassos, an astronaut who lands on the planet Atropos in search of the mysterious "White Shadow" signal and finds herself trapped in a time loop.

After crash-landing on a shape-shifting alien planet, Selene finds herself fighting tooth and nail for survival. Every time she’s defeated, the player is forced to restart the journey.

name: Age of Fear 4: The Iron Killer
description: Play as Angela, a fearless young Vampire Hunter on the trail of a brutal murderer. Along with a mysterious Nazell, embark on an epic quest into the heart of the criminal underworld. Age of Fear is a deep and complex turn-based strategy series (full of humour!) that fuses a tabletop wargame with RPG elements.

name: R-Type Final 2
description: R-Type has returned! The legendary side-scroller is back and better than ever with beautifully rendered 3D graphics, exhilarating shoot-'em-up gameplay, and a multitude of stages, ships, and weapons that will allow you to conduct a symphony of destruction upon your foes.

name: Skjoldur Story
description: In this lighthearted pastoral adventure, explore a vast and whimsical world, confronting dangers in whichever order you choose using nothing but a magical shield.

name: Strange World
description:
Explore of what remains in this strange post-apocalyptic world.

Waking up from cryosleep in a world unfamiliar to them, a rag-tag group of survivors ban together to escape this dangerous land in hopes of discovering the cause of a strange apocalyptic event .

Strange World is a hybrid genre game combining RTS (Real-time strategy) with survival game elements. You can control up to 4 characters simultaneously to explore, manage and scavenge while crafting various tools and weapons to survive and thrive in this dangerous world.

name: Unotale: Card Game
description: Unotale: Card Game is an Undertale implementation of the famous card game where you try to eliminate all your cards first! And torture your friends with skips and draw cards!

name: Sekai no Chuushin de, AI ha Tatakau
description: Programming learned from games. Sequential, branch, repeat. New type of programming puzzle where you can experience basics of programming.

name: Wave_Machine
description: Wave_Machine is a small adventure where you meet friendly creatures who need your help. Get rid of the pests then stay to chat to the islanders.

name: Diving Bell
description: Diving Bell is a small game poem about sinking slowly into strange waters. It's lightly inspired by a passage in B.K. Evenson's book Dead Space: Martyr that describes the protagonist's long descent into the ocean.

name: Wall of Taiji
description: The Wall of Taiji is the revolutionary new 1-of-a-kind 1 player free solitaire card game - that is similar to the Classic Pyramid Solitaire, yet very different in a good way. This game is an instant classic that will go down in history for changing the card game industry. The Wall of Taiji is super easy to learn but will keep challenging your brain game after game. A full game takes between 1 to 2 minutes to play. Whether you are a young kid looking to get better at your math, or an old person looking for a simple game to pass the time while standing in line at the grocery store, The Wall of Taiji is the ultimate mobile solitaire card game for all ages.

name: Eastern Market Murder
description: Step back in time to solve a true crime! Delve into a world of fortune tellers and phrenologists in this twisted true tale of murder and madness. Blood red radishes, a business rivalry, whispers of false friends. When everything is not as it seems, will you foresee how it ends? With options to play at home, or where the events actually occurred, you’ll explore crime scenes, question witnesses and examine evidence to outsmart the killer and reclaim justice for the victim's family.

name: Partisans 1941: Back Into Battle
description: Fighting the invaders is like fighting a hydra: you cut off one head, and in its place two new ones immediately grow. But that’s no reason to give up! Return to the Eastern Front in this DLC featuring customizable scenarios, new maps and a new game mode!

name: The Little Drone 2
description: You are a little drone sent to investigate a debris field on the edge of Dark Space in a lost world behind the Bermuda Triangle, that seems to be caught in some kind of state of flux. You must collect all Data Nodes lost there so that their data can be retrieved by your makers back in Cloud Space.

name: 112 Operator: Pandemic Outbreak
description: New DLC will challenge you in the direst situation - the pandemic taking over your city.

name: Catch the Stars: Japan
description: Click on the right star, solve the puzzles and be enchanted by these beautiful Japanese landscapes. CATch the Stars: Japan is a beautiful minimalist puzzle with a relaxing, pleasant and original soundtrack.

name: Vast Trivia of the Void
description:
Put your knowledge of several topics to the test! Sports, history, science, anime, video games and more! But since Thing of the Void thought that just knowing wasn’t fun enough, move around in his playground, collecting cards and increasing your combo! Cash out or go deeper, for higher rewards but possibly higher risks! Monetary, of course!

Do you have what it takes to make it big at the biggest game show from the darkest pits of the universe?

name: Flood Fighting Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Planet Coaster: Premium Edition
description: Build your ultimate coaster park with Planet Coaster: Premium Edition! It contains the celebrated base game alongside seven spectacular DLC packs adding an extra 35 rides, 450+ new blueprints, and thousands of fresh scenery pieces. Get nostalgic with vintage attractions, design cinematic stunt shows, create spooky new zones, and much, much more…

name: MushrooMonster
description: MushrooMonster is a first-person survival horror game. You arrived at the forest island tonight to fight the evil mushroom monster. There is only one way to kill the monster - that is to collect 12 mushrooms and burn them in a bonfire.

name: Extreme Racing
description: Extreme Racing is a wonderful racing game in which you will enjoy spending your time and at the same time test your driving skills in a cool racing mode! If you are attracted to the big magical world of speed and off-scale adrenaline, then the game Extreme Racing is just for you!

name: Zombie Survival Online
description: Zombie Survival Online is a top-down 2D shooting multiplayer game that you can enjoy in 10 to 16 minutes. Pick up items, combine them, and survive the longest among other players in a large city where zombies appear at night! As the days go by, the sort of zombies increases, and poisonous gas hits the city...

name: Tail Trail
description: Follow the story of a Private investigator hired to find a missing person on a mysterious island.

name: Under the Ghost Mountain
description: A MetroidVania、SoulLike、2D Action Platformer Game. There are a mountain called the ghost mountain in this game. Under the ghost mountain is hell,so there are many ghost arround the mountain. Player will run away from mountain top, and will face many ghost. It's a story about a hero's growing up.

name: Wonderful Girls
description: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: The Hell Hives
description: Classic FPS style game with modern graphics. Fight through a series of highly challenging levels in a variety of environments. Take on many types of enemies with your shotgun, assault rifle, grenade launcher & nuke launcher. Solve puzzles, race rising lava, decipher codes and activate portals.

name: Robin Hood: Hail to the King
description: Welcome to Robin Hood's third incredible adventure! From its comical campaign to its hilarious bonus chapter, you will love guiding the legendary Robin Hood and his friends in this new time-management game.

name: Pirate Popper VR
description: Play our take on the first Bubble Buster game in VR.

name: Shokujinki
description: A man-eating monster wakes up, in a snowy night. He meets a mysterious girl willing to die. This omnibus novel game tells the story of the strange interaction between them.

name: Ontei no Ein: Mahou Shikake no Chouritsushi
description:
This is a puzzle, adventure game in which you will need a good ear to bring the world back alive!

Repair 10 magical music boxes by playing or rewinding different music tracks as you navigate the environments and manipulate the objects each one contains.

name: Ike Ike! Sorena-chan! Shooting Star!
description: Sin descripción

name: Upside
description: In this interesting arcade game you have to protect a cute animal flying upwards. Use the mouse to control the round shield and repulse objects approaching the character, restrain their dense pile-up, or simply swipe to the sides.

name: Nature Park
description: Adventure Games

name: Space Ape
description: How far can you take Dimitri the Russian Space Ape on his arcade adventure!

name: Retro Clicker
description: Retro Clicker - A beautiful retro clicker with a huge variety of monsters. The player hires various units for the knocked out gold and goes through an endless world of levels.

name: Girl Jigsaw
description: This is a "beautiful girl puzzle interactive" game, in the game, your goal is to put the puzzle pieces together, and interact with the character.

name: Hero Sword
description: Hero Sword is a 2d slasher game in which the player dodges tackles, cuts enemies with a sword, accumulates mana, hits with powerful charges of magic and fights off the advancing waves of monsters.

name: Good Mourning
description: Good Mourning tells a compelling story about rejoice and regrets, redemption and letting go. It’s a tale about good and bad, self-reflection, choices and chances and all the ups and downs of ordinary life.

name: Sky Roll!
description: Tilt the floor, roll the ball, avoid obstacles, jump gaps, go faster! Attempt to complete all 120 levels and find all 360 red coins Looking for something addictive with hours of game play? Install 'Sky Roll!' today!

name: War Dogs: Red's Return
description: Follow Red as he faces challenges to uncover the reason behind the current state of chaos in the suburbs, in this retro beat' em up inspired classic.

name: Deadly Cosmic
description:
In Deadly Cosmic you play as Raquel, a scientist who needs to save her co-workers from an accident at the establishment where she works, but something is wrong. What happened to the company? What are these creatures? Most importantly, will she be able to survive?

Deadly Cosmic is a short but fun game, inspired by the classic survival horrors of the 90s. We made this game in 15 days for a GameJam (Unexpected Jam), but this is an enhanced and complete version of the game made after the results.

name: Reed the Robotanist
description: Reed the Robotanist is a 3D Platformer where you Hover, Jump, and Launch your way through various stages. Play as Reed Shoots, a plant-human hybrid working to take down the evil Oil Corporation!

name: Warpips
description: Warpips is the ultimate quick to learn but amazingly deep tug-of-war strategy game. Deploy the right composition of soldiers, tanks, helicopters and planes in this tight, streamlined strategy-focused war game. Compose the best army, research the right tech; overwhelm your enemy!

name: WarDogs: Red's Return
description: After a catastrophic plague almost sweeping the world, The remnants of humanity have turned to genetic engineering to survive. Unrecognizable, humans now strive to recover in the few cities that still exist.

name: BulletRoyale
description:
Welcome to BulletRoyale!

The all new 2D Top Down BattleRoyale styled game! This game includes art styles that are very clean and simple, and this game is also developed by the Shibaflow Development Team which has previously made the game on the play store known as FrontFight.

name: Star Wars Pinball VR
description: Immerse yourself with 8 amazing Star Wars Pinball tables in VR - including one based on The Mandalorian - and level up the pinball action with a customizable Fan Cave, Career Mode, Force Powers, and Total Immersion.

name: Overcoming Obstacles
description: "Overcoming Obstacles" is a 2D physics platformer for the most agile players! You need to collect all stars and to get your ball to the level exit.

name: Space Warrior
description: Experience the world of an alternative future of the Earth and get caught up in a plot of a full-on space saga. It would seem that there is nothing to discover in the Solar System. But in the most remote corners of the Universe mankind has come up against cruel resistance. You are the only one who can save the galaxy from an alien race of invaders! Choose Railgun, Blaster or Lasers and go up against hordes of alien foes. Float like a butterfly and pity like a bee in true 3D combat. Get the cash and pump up your ships and complete all of the campaign levels. FEATURES: - popular space setting - futuristic enemies and bosses - breathtaking 3D world - tons of gorgeous shots, explosions and effects - old-school bulletstorm arcade - very easy to play, have fun You like space, shooting and old arcades - this game is for you!

name: Fly Together!
description: The sequel to the award winning Conduct Together! takes players to the skies in a race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by drawing flight paths and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles. Fly Solo or hand a Joy-Con to your friends and co-pilot through an expansive campaign. Complete contracts, upgrade your airport and collect a growing fleet of airplanes. Fly against your friends in hectic up-to-8-player battles: throw meteors, invoke tornadoes or drop a giant cake on your opponents. The pilot who gets the most passengers safely to their destination wins. Here’s some rad things in this game • Pilot planes in a beautiful 3D world with handheld, stick and motion controls. • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone • Seamlessly shift between single and multiplayer. Play as the solo pilot or pass the Joy-Con to friends for up to 8 players • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new airplanes • Progress through exotic islands with unique themes • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Mikkel Gemzøe • From the Award winning team that brought you Conduct TOGETHER!

name: Piczle Cross Adventure + PictoQuest: The Cursed Grids
description:
Solve nonogram puzzles and experience the story of 2 different puzzle adventures!

Piczle Cross Adventure
Join our heroes Score-chan, Gig, and Professor Matrix on an adventure in a grand open world. Are the plans of the evil Dr.Mona Chromatic and under_SCORE. Fix every area by solving nonogram puzzles and rebuild the world.Earn XP, level up, and discover all the secrets of Piczleshire!

Picto Quest The Cursed Grids
Test your puzzle skills helping two young heroes on their quest to obtain the legendary paintings! Defeat enemies (even bosses!) On your way to stop sneaky wizard Moonface.Help villagers with special missions and buy magical objects to help them on their journey.

name: Reknum Cheri Dreamland
description: REKNUM Fantasy of Dreams is an action, exploration and 2D platformer videogame, it is the latest installment in the REKNUM saga in which Cheri awakens from a fantasy to start the real adventure! Explore the thematic levels, unlock new weapons and upgrade your skills, fight fearsome bosses inspired by classic gameplay, decipher the poetic words of the ancestors when you travel through the dreamworld and reach the real final outcome.

name: Voxel Battle Simulator
description: Voxel Battle Simulator is a voxel-based tactical game. Deploy your units on the battlefield and watch as the struggle unfolds in this simple and humorous, voxel-based tactical game. Featuring 90 levels of a single-player campaign spread across 6 different world environments. Pit units against each other in the sandbox mode and see which army comes out on top once everything turns to rubble.

name: The Adjudicator
description: The Adjudicator is an interactive FMV (full motion video) game. Two detectives investigate mysterious murders. The final judgment is coming soon, help to detect the mystery and find out the truth!

name: Piczle Puzzle Adventures + Picto Quest Puzzle Bundle
description:
Solve nonogram logic puzzles and experience the story of two different puzzle adventures!

Piczle Cross Adventure
Follow our heroes Score-chan, Gig and professor Matrix in a daunting open-world adventure. Foil the plans of the evil Dr. Mona Chromatic and under_SCORE. Restore each area by completing nonogram puzzles and rebuild the world. Earn XP, level up and uncover the secrets of Piczleshire!

PictoQuest: The Cursed Grids
Challenge your logic skills by helping our two young heroes on their quest to return the legendary paintings of Pictoria! Defeat enemies on your way (even bosses!) to stop the sneaky wizard Moonface. Help villagers with special missions and buy magical items from the store that can help you on journey.

name: Total War: Rome Remastered
description:
Total War: Rome Remastered lets you relive the legacy that defined the strategy game series. Remastered to 4K with multiple improvements to visuals as well as refinements to gameplay, it's time to revisit a true classic. Not everyone gets a second chance to conquer the Roman Empire.

Includes:
Total War: Rome Remastered + Alexander & Barbarian Invasion DLC
Rome: Total War - Collection (original 2004 title)

name: Frauki's Adventure!
description: Frauki's Adventure is a melee-combat platformer where you fight your way deep into a strange and mysterious world. Challenging sword-fights and a sprawling, bizarre world await!

name: Réussir: Code de la Route - Nouvelle édition
description: Sin descripción

name: R-Type Final 2: Limited Edition + Special Chronicle Box Set
description: Sin descripción

name: R-Type Final 2: Limited Edition
description:
The R-Type Final2 Limited Edition includes:

- R-Type Final2
- Artwork
- Official Soundtrack
- Metal Earth R9A Model
- 33rd Anniversary Pilot Tag
- Collector’s Box

name: New Pokémon Snap
description: New Pokémon Snap is an on-rails first-person photography game developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by Nintendo and The Pokémon Company for the Nintendo Switch. It is a sequel to the 1999 Nintendo 64 game Pokémon Snap. Players explore an archipelago in an autopilot hovercraft and photograph Pokémon in order to conduct research about their ecology.

name: Insurmountable
description:
Insurmountable is a strategic adventure game with roguelike elements, in which you have to overcome a dangerous randomly generated mountain. Confront the differing terrains as a lonely mountaineer and make your way through Ice, Snow and Stone. Use items to keep up your steadily sinking stats, while making your way up and down the insurmountable heights. The dynamic and ever-changing weather system, the day-night cycles, and numerous other events will make sure that you meet tough challenges on your journey to the top.

To live up to these challenges, you are able to improve your character. By earning experience points through events, you can choose skills to help you with certain playstyles. One of the serveral roguelike elements is permadeath, which forces you to try various strategies in your pursuit to summit the mountain.

The game focuses, on the one hand, on the decisions you make in a risky environment full of uncertainties, on the other hand, on evoking intense emotions people experience in such a harsh and savage environment.

name: Bonsai Castles
description: A tower defense game based on Japanese castles. Excavate the ground to create a moat, build walls and turrets, and fight off the enemies that attack you!

name: Summoners War: Lost Centuria
description: Collect and upgrade cards featuring iconic monsters from the Summoners War world to use in battle. Equip your monsters with unique combinations of Runes and Skill Stones. Join an Alliance with friends to share monster cards and earn additional rewards. Craft the perfect strategies and teams to battle your way through an epic adventure.

name: Emergency HQ
description: Build your own mission base and put together the perfect emergency services team!

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - FB-22 Strike Raptor Set
description: An add-on for Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - F-15 S/MTD Set
description: An add-on for ACE COMBAT 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - F-16XL Set
description: An add-on for ACE COMBAT 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

name: Testing Pool
description:
A gothic cell with positive gameplay. You can fire the rocket launcher at stuff and pick your own route through the level.
Completionists can visit an optional extra fight which is a little tougher than the rest of the map.

Built with Eternity 4.2 in mind; If you use Eternity you get MOD music and extra text if you leave via the secret exit. but the map itself is perfectly Boom compatible.

name: Genshin Impact: Beneath the Light of Jadeite
description:
Version 1.5 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Eula and Yanfei
• New story quests for Zhongli and Eula
• New hangout events: Noelle (Act II) and Diona
• New main event: Energy Amplifier Initiation
• New housing system: Serenitea Pot
• …and more!

name: Blast Beats
description: Blast Beats is an Insane 1-Tap Rhythm Game with a Power Packed Soundtrack & Retro Pixel Art Aesthetic.

name: Death Game Royale
description:
Accused of crimes you didn't commit, you suddenly find yourself fighting for your life alongside actual criminals! The only way to survive these death games is to assemble a team, but how do you know who to trust?

As you begin to work together, you notice your teammates are looking at you as more than just an ally. Will you sweep them away with your sharp wits and charm or will you lead them to purgatory?

name: G-Mode Archives+: City Connection Rocket
description:
Agent Clarice, step on the accelerator! In order to protect the peace of the earth, fly to the world with your favorite car!

City Connection Rocket, which was previously released for feature phones, is a legitimate sequel to the City Connection series, one of Jaleco's signature works.

Clarice, an agent dispatched from the United Nations, boards the new Clariscar and goes on a mission to recover the super-secret documents stolen by the runaway secret society "Spiritus".

Let's find the super-classified documents hidden on the stage while handling enemy characters well by making full use of the series's annual "oil cans" and "super rockets" that can destroy the road with your body.

There are also many huge bosses such as tanks and battle helicopters, and hidden characters with Jaleco fans.
Also pay attention to the cute Clarice that is displayed when the stage is cleared!

name: Root: The Riverfolk Expansion
description:
Two new factions and Vagabond variants bring new challenges to Root!

Riverfolk Company
The Riverfolk Company is open for business – the woodland may be at war, but there's no reason you can't make a profit! Establish trade posts and earn your victory!

Lizard Cult
Spread the scaly gospel of the Lizard Cult! Tend your gardens to radicalize new acolytes, and reveal the true extent of your proselytizing power!

New Vagabond Variants!
Three new Vagabonds skulk into the woodland to help you swindle your way to victory!
The Scoundrel torches the woodland rather than see others rule it
The Vagrant starts fights that others have to finish
The Arbiter offers their services...for a price, of course!

name: Kanda Alice mo Suiri Suru.
description: Yuri visual novel.

name: When There Is No More Snow
description: HYPER LOW RES SUPER RETRO visual novel made in ZZT with teen angst, saxophones, and UFOs.

name: Forest Camp Story
description: The great outdoors are calling! Create and run your own campground in this business management sim. Get a lay of the land and find the best places to camp. Before you know it, customers will be setting up tents and taking pictures, making memories that will last a lifetime. But it's not all about peace and solitude. With activities like bird watching, fly fishing, and horse riding, there's no shortage of ways to show your campers a good time! No camping experience? No problem! Set up guided tours to show new campers the ropes, and they'll soon be coming back for more. If you play your cards right, you might get visits from rabbits, squirrels, and other cute critters too! Don't be afraid to branch out and grow your business. Set up a camping goods store in nearby towns to earn extra cash and attract new customers. Get more people interested in your wares, and you might just spark a nationwide camping craze... Answer the call of the wild and start creating the camp of your dreams!

name: Lost Harem
description: Lost Harem is an adult game, in which you have to find your harem. You can't hesitate. The passion for girls only grows.

name: In Marte: The First Moon
description: In the game on Mars, Dom wakes up in a ship without knowing very well where he is, nor why he is there, much less where his body ended up. Help Dom find answers and have fun in this mind-blowing adventure.

name: Crossy Bridge
description: Crossy Bridge is an arcade survival race where you move across a bridge with floating platforms that you need to stop in time to drive over them.

name: Atrium Invasion
description: A wave-based fighting game where you can buy stuff to amplify your speed, strength and defence by unlocking advanced combat equipment and compete with your friends with the real-time online leaderboards!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Zhuge Liang's Northern Campaign Event Set
description: A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Subjugation of Nanman & Event Set
description: A set that includes an additional scenario and events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 4th Wave: The Battle for Wu
description: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Sword and Space
description: This is a martial arts game with lovely characters and close to history, The main plot takes about 80 minutes.If you want to know what life was like for civilians in ancient times,It's a good choice,But you need to read the Decrypt System and the People's conversation,It will be a different ride.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Variety Pack 3XS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Drunken Samurai
description: Drunken Samurai is a 2D platformer where as a samurai you have to get some booze to keep the fun going. The drink-lover will stop at nothing! Kill opponents level by level and get your sake.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Experimental Aircraft Series
description: This special set contains 3 ACE COMBAT 7: SKIES UNKNOWN add-ons, including the F-15 S/MTD Set, the F-16XL Set, and the FB-22 Strike Raptor Set. As a bonus, it also includes 10 emblems and 10 skins.

name: Security Breach: Fury's Rage
description: Security Breach: Fury's Rage is a side-scrolling fighter game. The game was published as an apology for the second delay of Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach.

name: The Last King's Archer
description: Survive the night killing enemies using your bow, Fire Dragon or Thunder Dragon special attacks in this wave based 2D platformer packed with a lot of action and upgrades. Can you last until daylight?

name: VHAIP
description: Vhaip is a scary survival game in VR. Survive to raptors in co-op or solo up to 4 players. Survive or kill are the only way ! Will you survive ?

name: Balance Ball
description: In the game you have to balance the ball on the platform, so as not to fall into the abyss. Good luck in the exciting world of Balance Ball.

name: Armored Xpress
description: Armored Xpress is a new unique story-driven Match 3 game built with rich RPG elements and an ATB battle system.

name: Prince of Wallachia
description: Prince of Wallachia is a historical action platformer with atmospheric levels and historical characters

name: Art of Space
description: Art of Space is a fast-paced space combat shooter with some unique mechanics and customisation options. Includes a story/campaign mode.

name: Immoral Quartet
description: Immoral Quartet is an erotic Visual Novel.

name: Firewar
description: Firewar Is 2D side-scrolling endless shooting and survival game

name: Alpha Particle
description:
Alpha Particle is a sci-fi action game about a defenseless particle that has to overcome it's obstacles creatively.

Play as a newly created particle traveling to various space stations in the quest to discover your purpose.

Action with no shooting.
Solve mini puzzles.
Upgrades and abilities.
Bosses.
Become Alpha!

name: Little Traveler
description: Little Traveler is a stealth platformer where you play as a 4 inch tall transient who must stay unseen as she tries to bring joy back to a lonely widow’s life.

name: Gunducky Industries++
description:
Contact with our forces has been lost. I presume they have all been destroyed by the robot uprising. Keeping low in valleys and amongst buildings to stay out of range of their anti aircraft weapons, I have no choice but to fly my plane to the robot factory in an effort to destroy their manufacturing facilities once and for all.

Updated version of Gunducky Industries with improved graphics and extra gameplay elements.

Fly your plane with arcade flight simulator controls through narrow levels shooting enemy robots and dodging amongst obstacles such as trees and ancient ruins.

8 levels over four different environments: River Valley, Ancient Ruins, City and within the Robot Factory

Slower moving physical bullets mandating considered aiming.

name: Everyday Today's Menu for Emiya Family
description: The video game adaptation of the deliciously heartwarming world of today’s menu for Emiya Family is finally here! Watch as Saber, Sakura, and Rin slice, stir-fry, bake, and deep-fry their way through a variety of delectable recipes!

name: A Token War
description: A Token War is a tactical, turn based deck building game where you assemble a unique collection of Tokens and Spells to use in battle across five distinct regions.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Cross II
description: Thunder Cross II is a shooting game released by Konami in 1991. Control Blue Thunder 2 and Red Thunder 2 and battle for the survival of the galaxy. Upgrade your shots and increase your options to defeat the bosses. Two player co-op is also available.

name: Taiwan Monster Fruit: Prologue
description: Taiwan Monster Fruit is an exciting, parkour-style, motion-sensing game. Experience challenges and adventures by working together, but still competing with one another, in single-player or four-player team modes. Players will be equipped with different types of cards and work together to become the best team of little monster warriors. Levels and Missions The Monster Fruit world is filled with fantastic creatures; in this world, creatures seemingly identical from those in the real world can have unexpected powers. Embark on a wondrous adventure, and complete progressively more demanding levels in a variety of scenarios. You may be battling through a mysterious land of water, climbing up unimaginably tall beanstalks, or running among scorching volcanoes. Each level will test the reflexes of the best little monster. Easy to Use/Diverse Challenges Taiwan Monster Fruit allows everyone to pick up the game quickly and have fun together, but in order for players to protect themselves during the chaos of battle, they must organize themselves and make the best out of their limited cards. Only a well-prepared and coordinated team can save the monster world and become the best team of little monsters. Different Gaming Modes As the game progresses, a number of special challenge levels will be revealed. You can compete with your teammates to get the best score and become the MVP of the game. Get Moving for an Exciting Adventure! An interesting parkour-style motion-sensing game where players can choose a team of 1 to 4 little monsters to go on an adventure. Access different skills (cards) by moving…

name: Sixit
description:
Sixit is a small narrative puzzle game where you have SIX actions per run.

In Sixit, you start each run by choosing the order of your six actions, which will be used to solve puzzles and explore the forest. Over the course of multiple runs you will unlock new abilities, meet cute animal friends, and (hopefully) save the village from the impending storm.

name: To Hell With It
description: Hack 'n' Slash your way up Hell's corporate ladder in this "down the rabbit hole" adventure to retrieve your stolen cat from the Underworld!

name: Heaven vs Hell
description: Play as Heaven or Hell in this semi-turn-based action strategy game. Gather your army, Challenge evil monsters, use magic and collect keys on your way to Victory!

name: Gel-Tank
description: Casual but profound! Simple, authentic 16-bit 2D style that will satisfy everyone from beginners to experts The action shooter is here! Dive into the soft and hard world of the ultimate 16-bit world, down to the resolution! Ugh!

name: Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 01 to 05
description:
Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 01
The goal of SORD is to train a new generation of operatives to defend the country against future threats. To that end, the organization has established a series of schools up and down the country. Mihama Academy more-or-less left to rot after its abrupt closure, has been given a new purpose as one such 'specialist training school'. Mihama now entrusts the misfit girls who attend it with guns and live ammunition. Paying their own safety no heed, these students are again and again plunged into dangerous extrajudicial missions - all for the good of the realm. No matter how much life grinds them down, what future awaits these girls, who've themselves chosen the path of the gun?

Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 02
A VIP arriving from abroad mysteriously disappears in transit. The SORD team at Mihama Academy is presented with a new mission: finding and recovering him. Whenever they appear to be closing in on this missing "package", though, it somehow slips through their fingers. Accompanying them on their mission are two fellow SORD from the Kyousen Sakuragaoka campus - twin sisters, who both help and hinder the crew. There have also been rumors floating around of a daredevil biker named "Soul Speed", who tears up the streets at night. Before long, the team's thrilling chase descends into a deathmatch, pushing the combatants to their limits and beyond. Rena and Haruto, meanwhile, are taken on a journey deep into the past, to their first-ever encounter.

Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 03
While Rena and Maki recover from their injuries, the other SORD members jet off overseas for a school trip. Within moments of their arrival, though, the Mihama gang are pulled into a manhunt for a SORD deserter, assisted by students Sylvia and Velvet of St. Aile's International School. Tohka's the star of the show this time round, but she's wrestling with her own issues - old memories of her parents, and a promise to a friend that she wasn't able to keep...
“You're right. There's a reason we need to get back... even if it means crawling home on our hands and knees.”
“Let's meet up again someday... if we're still alive.”
And introducing Sengoku Ayame - Sengoku Ichiru's brother, and a handler at St. Aile's:
“If taking her in alive's too much of a challenge, just get rid of her - I don't give a damn. I simply want to see this mess cleaned up.”
What answers will Tohka find?
She has the truth in her sights...

Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 04
Kumashiro Megumi (Gumi), recently transferred from St. Aile's International School, has been training hard together with Rena and Maki – now fully recovered from their injuries. With the help of her mentor, Tohka, she's shaping up to be a fine sniper.
Just as one new student settles in, another has her sights set on joining the girls in Class A, Mihama's elite combat unit. Her name? Sengoku Taiga. Haruto, the team's handler, has one condition for Taiga's transfer: that Chris serves as her supervising officer.
The two seem an unlikely pair at first, but after spending some time with little Taiga, Chris soon finds a way to see things from her perspective.
It's at that moment that the nation is suddenly rocked by a terror attack on an unprecedented scale. Chris rushes to the scene, aware of what's at stake, but paying no heed to the dangers ahead.
Just as she did, once before.
"This is even worse than we could've imagined..."
The death toll keeps on rising, but SORD are stuck watching helplessly from the sidelines. What destiny awaits Chris, Taiga... and Mihama Academy?
"Oh, right... I must have died..."
Clutching to memories of her long-dead mother, she too prepares for an eternity of slumber...

Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 05
A few weeks have passed since SORD successfully resolved the Kitaoka University terrorist incident - albeit with some sacrifices - when Murasaki's older sister Yuuki returns to Japan and returns to Mihama Academy.
Being more sociable and capable than her sister, Yuuki immediately befriends the other students and builds a trusting relationship with them.
"There's no reason for me to be at Mihama anymore..."
As Murasaki starts questioning her raison d'etre, she reminisces about the time when she first met Haruto.
A few years earlier...
Lamenting his lack of experience, he had come to her village hidden deep in the mountains in search of new skills.
He got to know the Ikoma sisters better and kept up with his training. As he seeks out the village's "secret art", a sudden tragedy befalls them.
"I'll never forgive you...!!"
"It's okay... Don't worry... I'm not... going anywhere... I'm here with you..."
"I'm stumped... It's exactly as she said - and there's no way to cut a phantom..."
"Come on. Chin up... Show me your courage..."
Their fateful meeting was also the beginning of a tragic story...

name: Defiance & Mr. Good Looking
description: Defiance and Mr. Good Looking is a fast-paced single player FPS where you play as two characters (a Gunslinger and a Swordsman), switching between them to manage health and ammo.

name: Crime Opera: The Butterfly Effect
description: Crime Opera is a tale of both loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, and both the strength and frailty of familial bonds. These visual novels follow the Gallos as they are pitted against the outside forces of the mafia world, and eventually, each other as well.

name: Clodhoppers
description: Clodhoppers is the clay-animated multiplayer brawler where wild mountain folk trade punches, bombs and insults in the fight for glory. Up to 8 players can play in this game designed around quick matches and big laughs.

name: Laws of Attraction
description: Laws of Attraction, Book 1 is the first book of the Laws of Attraction series. It is followed by Laws of Attraction, Book 2.

name: Fallout 76: Season 4 - Cold Steel
description:
Cold Steel is a board game based on the fictional cartoon adventures of Armor Ace and his companions, the Power Patrol. It was created and published by Dynamite Animation Company.

In the wake of the American "liberation" of the Yukon Territory, a damaged Assaultron uploads its consciousness into a suit of T-45 power armor and is reborn as Commissioner Chaos. The rogue A.I. forms the Yukon Five, a group of anti-imperialist robots which threaten to halt the march of Manifest Destiny.

name: Gem Hunter
description:
“Gem Hunter” (Cazador de gemas) is an MMORPG game that combines combat, gathering, farming and social interaction in one, with a variety of game mechanics and a classic PVP experience. Here you will find charming characters within a super adorable and romantic anime-style virtual world.
