Defeat terrible “Bosses” to raise your level and unlock extravagant abilities, also get the company of a faithful “Companion”, cute “Streales”, legendary “Gods” and among others. You can also create or join a guild for a more interactive and exciting adventure with other players.

name: Akairo Kimi to, Shiawase ni
description:
Let's go look for our happiness. Don't get drowned in the red evening.
A short BL visual novel.

name: Goodbye Eternity
description:
Goodbye Eternity is a point-and-click, adventure game with elements of visual novel and dating sim.

You have the possibility to have several paths when you interact with people, especially with women, depending on your actions and answers, the story will be different.

name: Valley of The Savage Run
description: Save the frogs from the predator. A challenging 2D pixel arcade game.

name: Another Dimension
description:
After becoming the unwitting participant in a truly revolutionary scientific breakthrough, you find yourself in a dimension spanning fight for survival.

Interdimensional travel is real, and you're at the center of the chaos that ensues. You never wanted anything except to live a regular life as a teenager, but that life is slipping further and further away...

name: Selkö
description:
You have come to dive here for the silence... but also because something amazing lies in the depths - or so says the rumor.

As you calmly descend into the abyss, use your flashlight to discover the aquatic life surrounding you and solve the puzzles protecting the secrets of the sea.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: What Happened in Addison's Grotto
description:
A young woman from a small fishing village goes missing. Days later agents of an unknown organization find her, take her to a secret location. The young woman saw something she shouldn't have and now something else sees through her.

It needs to be found, isolated, and exorcised.

You're the only one who can do it.

name: Santorini: Pocket Game
description:
Take a trip to Santorini, the gem of the Aegean Sea and the world's best resort!

Enjoy this 'Resort Management Simulation' game by building beautiful hotels and restaurants to create your vacation spots, as well as playing it as a healing & idle game, all the while enjoying the sea view.

name: Fairy Tail: Guild Masters
description: Fairy Tail Guild Masters is a simulation RPG where players can recruit characters from the Fairy Tail series into their own guild and engage in epic strategic battles. As players recruit more nakamas, they will be able to go against other players in unofficial and official tournaments to see just who is the best Guild Master!

name: Drillmin
description: A Game for Ludum Dare 48, "Deeper and Deeper."

name: Bouncy Cars
description: A racing game for two players sharing one keyboard. Their cars bounce off of each other, and off of the walls. The maps are randomly generated, but players can replay their favorites.

name: Ariel Cleanomancer and the Eldritch Sweep
description: Ariel has to vacuum the basements of a weird-ass hotel to become a certified cleanomancer.

name: DejaVu
description: A cute puzzle game playing with multiple parallel levels, looking a lot like each others. But there is more to meet the eyes...

name: 6 Feet Under
description: Play as a zombie who burrows their way to their home

name: Underneath
description: Underneath is an action platformer that can be played with single mouse only. Position your pistol well to survive hazards of this mysterious temple. Find your way to whats down below and witness the true power of whats underneath.

name: Tap Tricks
description: One button skateboard game, where each level is your own personal skate park to mess around in.

name: Wolf's Wool
description: An abstract visual novel about wondering what you are under the crumbling cover.

name: A Firm Handshake
description: Reach out and touch your fellow man.

name: River Legends
description: River Legends: A Fly Fishing Adventure is a single-player, pixel art fishing simulation with RPG and adventure elements. Learn to fly fish while traversing the virtual Pine Canyon. With River Legends, you can play at your own pace and choose your own goals. Try to catch all of the fish species available or just target trophy fish. Stick with your favorite fishing spots or keep exploring new regions as you unlock them. Earn new items to cast farther and to expand your fishing territory. Relax and cast your line in the best locations or hike to see the wonders of Pine Canyon at your leisure.

name: CuberPunk 2090
description: CuberPunk 2090 is an adventure game set in the village of Cuberovka. You play as Vova, a gamer and former president of Cube-States.

name: 新斗罗大陆：动画卡牌新霸主！
description: A popular game adaptation of the chinese manhua/novel/anime Soul Land/Douluo Dalu/Combat Continent by the author TangJiaSanShao. Free gifts and perks available to enable free players to thrive even without recharging or spending money. Experience the awesome storyline and unlock new features as you progress through the game

name: Super Huey 1 & 2 Airdrop
description: In 1985, Cosmi stunned the gaming world with the first helicopter flight simulator for the Commodore 64, then followed it up with an amazing sequel. Now, the original groundbreaking series returns together in one package! Pilot an experimental helicopter in these groundbreaking 8-bit sims.

name: Shadow Step
description: Blaze your own trail through uncharted and mysterious territory!

name: Pog
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Love Meeting
description: This is a casual draw line game. The girls in the game have different stories. You can chat with girls. The secret hidden in the girl is waiting for you to discover.

name: Arker: The Legend of Ohm
description: Explore the land of Ohm, recruit your hero and battle in exciting strategic online battles against other players.

name: Fallumns
description:
For Ludum Dare 48 Jam

I've always felt the Match-3 genre had the most depth! Wouldn't you agree?

Z and X rotate, Esc or ENTER pause. press Ctrl+Y to change controls.

name: Override 2: Super Mech League - Dan Moroboshi Fighter
description: This DLC unlocks Dan Moroboshi as a playable character in Override 2: Super Mech League.

name: Slime Dungeon Escape
description: Simple challenging 2D platformer where your goal is to help slime escape from the dungeon. Game consists of 45 levels with varied difficulty, from easy to very hard.

name: Slow and Steady
description: Slow and Steady is a game where you make the slowest tortoise ever reach the finish line.

name: Emperium
description: An epic adventure filled with loot, and monsters. Enter the world of Emperium!

name: Samurai Shodown: Hibiki Takane
description: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "HIBIKI TAKANE" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: Super Chopper
description: Climb into the cockpit of a military attack helicopter and take on five life or death scenarios, or make your own missions in the included level editor! Use your arsenal of weapons, speed and superior maneuverability to take down enemy tanks, helicopters and missile platforms.

name: Yurikago
description: This is a game where you can escape if you do something "Yuri."

name: Pandemic Love
description: A short visual novel about isolation. You try to search for comfort in the lonesome people around you. Keeping the darkness at bay with small embers of light. Will you let the fear change you?

name: Dirty Blood
description: The Blood Of The Undead Is Dirty! Play As The Specialist Soldier, And Save The World From The Undead "ZOMBIES" From Completing Your Mission!

name: Unbuild
description:
Here you have 15 completed building block constructs.
Can you take it brick by brick without anything falling to the ground?

Which stone you can take away determined by chance!

Have fun dismantling!

name: Europa Universalis IV: Leviathan
description: In the Europa Universalis IV: Leviathan expansion, you get new tools to centralize and accumulate power for your country. New diplomatic actions give you the means to go up against mightier counterparts and new economic tools will allow you to establish rich vassal empires that draw wealth and development to your monumental capital city. Leviathan also brings new improvements to other core areas of the game, such as colonies and regencies.

name: Slaughterhouse
description: Grabbing some weapons off the ground and slipping on a bulletproof vest, you head out to escape the slaughterhouse that has held you captive and transformed you into the bovine hybrid you are today. Your fellow bovines need you!

name: Garden Magic
description: A short match 3 game with unique mechanics.

name: Oceanwork
description: Dive deeper and deeper into the depths of the ocean to gather more and more rare resources. But watch out for what is lurking the depths. The shop, with all it’s upgrades will turn out to be very valuable. Dive, Mine, Sell & Thrive!

name: Ladders by Powgi
description: Make new words by changing one letter at a time. The goal is to turn one word into another using only a limited number of steps. Your reward? A free dad joke with each puzzle solved!

name: Simona's Requiem
description: Simona's Requiem is a retro styled platformer Inspired by old action adventure games but with a modern touch. Pick up the scythe as Simona and and slash your way to the Fisher King who has hidden behind the moon.

name: Retrograde
description:
Retrograde takes place across various time periods and places in history. Players will have an intense Third Person Shooter experience while delving into the vast worlds Retrograde offers. Primarily focused on a multiplayer design , Retrograde offers full LAN and Online options to the player. Each character has a unique ability as well as a perk that increases stats or loadout of a given type. Various types of guns and grenades allow for further adaption to the players preferences. Maps are based around a variety of time periods and environments some even featuring dynamic weather and night/day cycles.
The single player mode allows you to practice on a map of your choosing against bots designed to boost your skill level.

name: Godzilla Destruction
description:
App Store Description:
Become Godzilla and go on a worldwide rampage!
The exciting action game "Godzilla Destruction" has arrived!

Crush entire cities with just two simple actions:
Drag to move and release to attack!

〇Game Overview:
Skills: Destroy enemies to earn EXP and increase your level!
Learn new skills as you level up!
Upgrade Your Kaiju:
Use items earned from clearing stages and spinning gacha to make your Kaiju even more powerful!
Gacha:
Spin the gacha to win Kaiju and upgrade items!
World:
Make cities across the globe tremble in the wake of Godzilla's enormous power!
Shop:
Exchange gems obtained by clearing areas for upgrade items and powerful Kaiju!
Kaiju Field Guide:
Build your own original Kaiju collection!

name: Godzilla: Battle Line
description:
Godzilla Battle Line is an upcoming free mobile game for Android and iOS in which players duel with teams of kaiju and superweapons in three-minute matches. Toho Games will publish it in Australia and Canada in April 2021, with a worldwide release following in May.

App Store Description:
All the popular monsters and weapons from the Godzilla series are ready for battle!
Build your own team of the strongest monsters and fight against players from all over the world in real time.
Get ready for fun but intense 3 minute battles!

Battle:
Plan your strategy and send your monsters into battle!
Each monster will think and act on its own. When they approach the other player's monsters, the fight begins.
If your monsters defeat the other player's lead monster, victory is yours!

Team Formation:
Godzilla, Mothra, King Ghidorah, and all your favorite monsters are ready for battle!
Choose your monsters and weapons, and build the ultimate team!
The key to victory lies in the monsters and weapons you have on your side.

Discovering and Upgrading Monsters:
Win battles to acquire maps of Monster Island.
Explore the maps and discover new monsters!
If you find a monster you already have, use it to upgrade your monsters!

Battle Stages:
Cities all across the world become the stage for the ultimate monster showdown.
How your monsters interact with the unique features of each terrain will decide the winner!

Ranked Matches:
Aim for first place in the monthly ranked matches.
Get special rewards based on your ranking!

Featured Monsters and Weapons:
- Godzilla, "Godzilla vs. Biollante" (1989)
- King Ghidorah, "Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah" (1991)
- Rodan, "Ghidorah, the Three-headed Monster" (1964)
- Mothra, "Godzilla vs. Mothra" (1992)

...and more to come.
Stay alert for incoming destruction!

name: Terra Trilogy
description:
Terra Trilogy features three full games in one package that pay homage to the classic and retro arcade genre of the 1980s. While capturing the twitch gameplay of their predecessors, they're brought to you in glorious HD using vector graphics to provide clean, never pixelated graphics and advanced Newtonian physics.
Terra Lander, Terra Lander II – Rockslide Rescue, and Terra Bomber each offer the familiar boops and beeps that will inspire fond memories in veteran players while newcomers will appreciate the improved graphics, visual effects, and controls they come to expect from current-gen games.

name: Clan O'Conall and the Crown of the Stag
description: A 2D, art driven, puzzle-platformer inspired by Celtic mythology. The game contains rapid, on-the-fly character swapping, flashy attack combos and complex platforming challenges, packaged in gorgeous artwork inspired by mysterious Celtic folklore.

name: Mario Royale Legacy
description: Mario Royale Legacy is an unofficial continuation of InfernoPlus' Mario Royale (2019)

name: Morning Shift
description: Sin descripción

name: Not Exactly A Hero: Story game
description: Sick and tired of your usual typical superhero plots full of clichés? Wonder what it's like to live as an everyday citizen in a superhero universe? Play 'Not Exactly A Hero: Visual Novel, Story-driven Adventure Game' and find out!

name: Fishing the Deep
description:
Fish the deepest depths of the ocean with this Nintendo DS Homebrew Game!

Created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo Event.

name: Phazer Punk
description: Phazer Punk is a mini metroidvania game where you explore mysterious alien planets full of secrets and dangers. Use your phazer gun to destroy obstacles and your jetpack to reach new heights as you discover new areas and abilities. But be careful, as you go deeper and deeper into the planets core, you will face more challenges and enemies. Can you find all the hidden resources and escape the planets... Phazer Punk?

name: Wild
description: When you’re ready, start winning coins in a card game party online with players worldwide. You don’t even have to unlock any of the features to play card games with friends.

name: Sunken Tower
description: Sunken Tower is a platforming roguelike where you descend deeper and deeper into a randomly generated tower that sunk beneath the ground, in an attempt to get your hands on the king's wealth. Wealth isn't the only goal however; you're also searching for the fellow explorers who are lost in the depths, who range from new playable characters to vendors that can appear in future runs.

name: Like Veins Beneath the Town
description:
People already have a habit of going missing in the night near that Forest, but this case is a bit... different than the others. 21 women missing. The only evidence washed away in the rain. The village is divided between a select few that desperately want your help and a majority that will make sure you stay out of their affairs, even if you have to be the next one to disappear. Was it kidnapping, murder, or something much more dreadful? Who can you trust? Why was the railway project really abandoned? And what are those strange noises coming from the subway grates? This game will ask many more questions than it will answer-but that never stopped you before, did it now?

Features a dismal story, lots of custom art, one ending and a handful of ways to die with unique scenes!

This game focuses less on puzzles and gameplay, instead having a heavy emphasis on exploration/investigation and storytelling. It's roughly a half hour long depending on your playing speed. There are save points, but it is recommended that you play the entire game in one sitting. This game is set in the same universe as the other two. The order you play them in doesn't matter, but for those of you who are wondering, this is the third game in the series.

name: Humanity Lost
description: Will you save humanity? You are on a mission to find a new planet for humans to inhabit. In this story driven FPS space opera you will explore open world planets, find weapons, upgrade your character, and befriend alien species.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Mary Go Round
description: Mary Go Round is an original maybe series romance visual novel. You’ve been living a miserable life after marrying your first love. One day, you end up in a meteor shower, and you’re suddenly the young age of 18 again, getting another shot at choosing your first love. Who will it be? The man you loved, or the CEO-to-be?

name: Metal Soldiers 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Down 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Holey Hell
description: Try to stay alive as you run and jump deeper and deeper into the Holey Hell.

name: Agoraphobia
description:
After arriving at college, Joyce struggles with a yet-undiagnosed panic disorder while attempting to find direction and acceptance among their peers.

Their panic disorder distorts the world around them, rendering an otherwise friendly world overwhelming and horrific.

In search of respite, they stumble across their campus's art studio and begins to make peace with themself.

name: ZAR
description: ZAR (zombie apocalypse in Russia) is an indie first person shooter made in 3D graphics.

name: Gravity Snake
description: Gravity Snake is a 2D puzzle game that follows the adventures of a cute snake able to fold its body to squeeze through hard-to-reach areas. To complete a level, you need to collect all the apples scattered around it.

name: Wish: Paradise High
description: WISH - Paradise High is a puzzle game that combines visual Nobel elements that foster the appeal of female characters with various personalities.

name: One Shot in the Dark, Now I'm Dead.
description: They killed the world generations ago. Find out the truth and ascend to the Wire.

name: Just Get In Through the Door
description: This is a first-person puzzle game. All you need to do here is to get in through the door. You need to interact with cubes, elevators, etc.

name: Magical Strings
description: Intense multiplayer rhythm-projectile-fighting game set in ancient China!

name: Atlas Architect
description: A creative game where your imagination is your limit.

name: Erophone
description: Discover the secrets of the beautiful girls in the world by using the mysterious APP in your mobile phone!

name: Derpy Deep Drive
description: An Endless Bus Driving Game, created for Ludam Dare 48 created in Unrea Engine 4.

name: Unconventional Ragdoll Game
description: A relaxing game

name: Greedy Goblin
description: Greedy Goblin is a 3D "Looter Scooter!" LOOT gold and cursed artifacts to please the goblin king, and SCOOT past dangerous humans to solve puzzles and escape the ruins! Created by a University of Utah student developer team.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Fight, loot, craft equipment, collect your heroes and defeat evil! While doing all these, grow crops on your farm, feed your animals, make friends with the towns people, cook food, discover mysteries!

name: The Station: Escape Room
description: Escape the confinement of the space station and restart the systems to gain freedom. Cooperative Escape Room style game to challenge yourself and your friends. Seven rooms to solve the amazing and challenging mysteries before the timer runs out!

name: Red Archer
description: Red Archer is a first person shooter where you play as an archer and shoot demons as you descend deeper into the temple

name: Robot Start: Puzzle Game
description: In this puzzle game, play as an agile robot whose duty is to turn on the facility computers.

name: A Mysterious Gallery
description: In this rather special museum, you will have to observe all the paintings of famous artists! "A Mysterious Gallery" is a mix between a hidden object game and a puzzle game.

name: Awfully Good Pizza
description: A tribute to the pizza-making Flash games of the old Internet in which players must make the worst pizzas they can and rack up as much debt as possible.

name: Retro Space Fighter
description: There are 6 consecutive stages that the player can play. New enemies join to fight at each stage. The player has to complete a stage to play the next one. The player experiences new mechanics, assets, and effects as he or she plays through the final boss fight.

name: The Elevator
description:
You find yourself in an elevator with a cute girl. The elevator goes down, very deep.

Made for Ludum Dare 48.

name: Deepest Sword
description:
Venture deep into the Cavern of Longing. Plunge your sword deep into the dragon’s heart! How deep is your resolve?

- Feel the weight of a giant sword!
- Move in ways you never thought possible.
- Overcome your deepest struggles.

name: Frog
description:
How low can you go?

Fire up your NES console or favorite emulator and prepare for some truly ribbeting game-play as you descend to the depths.

name: The 3rd Building
description: "Remember it? Remember it!" I can't remember anything. Somebody keeps speaking to me: "Where are you? Where are you?" I need to go into my mind and find myself! I have come to this place named "The Third Building". My memory is buried here.

name: Push Stack
description:
Your moves are stored on the stack

The bottom value of a move is its direction

Any additional values are the indices of the boxes that were pushed

A red dash indicates the end of a move

A virtual undo takes the value at the bottom of the stack and moves the player in the opposite direction

Any additional values are interpreted as box indices and the corresponding boxes will be moved

The virtual undo continues until the stack is empty or a value with a red dash is read

A virtual undo reverses your most recent move using the values in the stack

A real undo reverts your most recent move or virtual undo

name: Trash Quest
description: Trash Quest is a compact metroidvania with a single spawn point, run and gun action and tight platforming. Navigate an interwoven maze of rooms through this space station, destroying robots, collecting power ups and unlocking shortcuts.

name: Nightfall
description: A social deduction game for 4-12 players where the Humans must determine which players are Werewolves and vote them out before they transform at night! Use equipment such as Invisibility, Blood Test & Camera and gather evidence to use to vote out others. Features special player roles.

name: Abyss of Neptune
description: Abyss of Neptune is a survival horror game set in the deep seas of the Bermuda Triangle. You are sent to investigate a mysterious underwater signal, but there is more to it than meets the eye. Do you have what it takes to survive the abyss?

name: F.O.S
description: A low poly open worlds suvival game, with IA in multiplayer.

name: Sound Voltex: Exceed Gear
description:
The sixth game in the rhythm game Sound Voltex, part of Konami's BEMANI franchise.

The theme of this iteration is Valkyries and it introduces a new kind of cabinet named the Valkyrie Model, which runs the game in 120hz, instead of the standard 60hz of the older models.

name: S.W.A.N.: Chernobyl Unexplored
description:
After the disaster in the Chernobyl nuclear plant, a secret research facility - the S.W.A.N. Institute gets out of control. Already dangerous phenomena became an even bigger threat and the corridors of this facility, forgotten by its own government, have seen incidents out of touch with reality.

S.W.A.N. (Syndrome Without A Name) is a science fiction FPS puzzle horror game, which takes place a few months after the Chernobyl Nuclear Plant disaster. It is a tale of an unexplored area within the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone - The S.W.A.N. Institute.

name: Mixpirit
description:
One rainy night, he wakes up from shortness of breath and finds a corpse laying flat. He is confused by his blood-stained body, a place he does not recognize, and the sight, when two men appear.
The two men call themselves "Karamora" and ask for his protection.
He is forced to accept.

name: BugDive
description:
You are falling down a giant hole and you have to collect bugs!
Created for the Ludum Dare 48. Please enjoy the funny bug game (:

name: Post Ghost
description:
It's time to deliver some spooky letters to the ghosts in the neighborhood.

They've been waiting for a long time to hear from their friends and family. Avoid obstacles and angry ghost doggies to make sure they get the right letters.

name: Wanderers
description: A short story with quick battles! Wander around, fight monsters, drink beer, make a friend.

name: Doki Doki Daigaku
description: When a computer glitch mysteriously ruins your perfect GPA, you're forced to attend summer school at an all-girls university to maintain your scholarship. The change of scenery isn't so bad—until your former high school rival takes roll. With your vacation ruined, can you drag the struggling members of WISH back into the spotlight, or is this the end of your dreams?

name: All the King's Men
description: A tiny physics game about realizing who you are.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Impostor
description: VS. Impostor is a mod that adds four new weeks revolving around the popular video game from 2018, Among Us.

name: Click Miner
description: The game takes place on an 8x8 grid, representing a layer of top-soil, and you play as The Click Miner. Your task is to hunt/click for the Magic Square, helped by mystical Arrows Of Mystery. Upon discovering (/clicking) the Magic Square, the soil is dug up around the area, revealing another layer of... who knows what? Only YOU can discover, as you go Deeper and Deeper into the Clicking World Of Click Miner.

name: B3313
description: A romhack of Super Mario 64 incorporating elements of beta content and urban legends surrounding the game to create a surreal, dream-like experience.

name: Sangwich
description: A sandwich building simulator.

name: 1-Bit Samurai
description: Slash your way through monsters in this black and white adventure.

name: Ara and the Empty Universe
description:
A game where nothing is happening metaphorically.
Let's say... you find yourself in a strange world where the trees and buildings all float 5 meters above ground level? That's no dream sequence, it's not metaphorical either, it's happening. Reality seems to be broken and you are going to have to face that.

Game length: 70 - 100 minutes, depending on how much you explore.

name: Sisão
description: Sisão is a puzzle-platformer game where you play as Sisão, a guy that found an Oasis after a long walk of twenty days in the desert! Is it an Oasis or a mirage? The reflection in the water has its own life, so you need to control both character with the same control scheme! Will you be able to put each respective character onto its flag at the same time?

name: Sonic Riders DX
description: Sonic Riders DX is a mod for "Sonic Riders" that enhances the game with new playstyles and balance for competitive play while improving the quality of the game with additional music, giving characters access to more gears, and fixing jank.

name: Junk: The Legend of Junichi Kato
description: This is the story of Junichi Kato after he reached the top of the world. On December 31st, New Year's Eve, Junichi is suddenly captured, and when he wakes up, he finds himself there... The world of 200 years later and the true identity of the Katroid are revealed. Save the world with your friends!

name: Redtape
description: An indie adventure game in which players must get a document signed by Satan.

name: Friendly Fire: Arena
description: Friendly Fire: Arena is a free-to-play 1v1 arena FPS that features parkour, combat and vertical mobility with intense gunplay. Enter the simulation as Sam or Vince and get ready to fight to the death, but don’t worry, no ones really harmed, after all… It's just Friendly Fire.

name: Keep looking
description: Introduction: This is a game that can bring you more fun when you are bored and unhappy.

name: Void Explorer
description: A deceased king has resurrected himself to take over his former kingdom. He has killed the king, taken over the castle, and put the land in ruin. It is up to you to stop him and restore peace to the land.

name: Cute Dark Elves
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Wild world
description: This is Wild World, there is danger at every step.

name: PixPhys
description: Make your dreams come true in our game! Build cars, boats, rockets, space stations and don't stop at nothing!

name: Bean
description: Bean is a single player first person parkour game. To move onto a new level, collect the gold orb and it will teleport you to the next level. Use WASD keys to walk. You can grapple using your burger onto the orange blocks using left click. You can go back to any level after you completed all levels. You are the red bean trying to get to the other 5 beans.

name: Chaos Awakens
description: Chaos Awakens is a re-imagination of the OreSpawn mod for Minecraft, it adds more bosses, armors, weapons, tools, dimensions, dungeons and so much more!

name: Attack on Reality
description:
Attack on Reality is an accurate recreation of the popular anime/manga, Attack on Titan, in Virtual Reality.
Take control of a scout as you fly through the air with Omni-Directional Gear.

name: Hell Crusher
description: What is this mod? well it is heavily inspired by a mix of Doom Eternal and Doom16, plus a bit of the whole "overpoweredness" inspired by other gameplay mods.

name: Karlson Run
description: Run through roads, rooftops, and prisons to reach that sweet milk at the end. But beware, dozens of robots, yellow dudes, and red bois want to stop you.

name: Gifts from Arthur
description:
Small sweet surprises for the neighborhood children.

A game inspired by To Kill a Mockingbird, made for the Novels That Shaped Our World jam.

name: Touhou Koujoukaku: Over the Developed Eden
description: Touhou fangame developed by Rodori.

name: Pressure
description: Deeper and deeper into an infinite basement of increasingly difficult enemies, how deep can you go? Pressure is a simple, high-score based arcade FPS with easy to learn but rewarding projectile mechanics. Search the maze-like floors for the green zone to drop into the next level and receive half your health back. Chaining combos of kills, hitting long range shots or bouncing shots off walls into enemies will also heal you. Enemies will hit harder and increase their spawns as you reach deeper and deeper floors. Watch out for harder enemy types as you go deeper.

name: RescueTeam
description: A single player TPS game where you must go on a rescue mission and return undercover agents to safety. Explore open world maps , collect coins , buy weapons and reach the highest score possible. Multi player mode , a TDM game with 2 teams fighting each other for the win .

name: Move Forward
description: Move Forward is an atmospheric adventure in the inner world with unique and diverse levels and interesting mechanics!

name: Angry Squirrel
description: Angry Squirrel - is the simplest platformer with surviving elements where you have to do the levels playing as a squirrel.

name: Happy Puzzle
description: Happy Puzzle is a puzzle game that extra an interesting story. The main character is a servant, working in a noble family. After save his young lady. He want to go to the forest to find the magic water.

name: Suteki na Kanojo no Tsukurikata
description: This is a story between a yandere social anxious girl and a wellborn young lady, produced by the Japanese Bishoujo game brand Sushi soft. Interaction occurs at several points where choices are given to the player, and these choices eventually lead to 8 various endings.

name: Dere Exe: Rebirth of Horror
description: Experience the terrifying first chapter in a series of platformer horror games.

name: Slash of Bullet
description: An exhilarating VR game with a new sensation where you take down many enemy robots with sword slashes.

name: Firelight Fantasy: Phoenix Crew
description: Firelight Fantasy: Phoenix Crew is a spectacular third-person sword fighting game based on Scandinavian mythology

name: Play the Fox
description: Chinese horoscope online battle "Play The Fox" released!

name: Synthbiotic Dungeon
description: Synthbiotic Dungeon is a fast paced, isometric, online multiplayer dungeon crawler in which you make the dungeon. Play as one of up to three runners running the gauntlet or as the dungeon master pulling the strings.

name: Frayhem
description:
Enjoy fun fast-paced battles in the arena of Frayhem!

Frayhem is a multiplayer brawler combining MOBA (multiplayer online battle arena) and battle royale elements, and it's easy to learn. Brawl with opponents to achieve glory in the arena! This multiplayer brawler can be learned by anyone but mastered by only a few. Try it for yourself and see if you can take the crown in battle royale and team-based modes. Become the legend of the mobile multiplayer arena!

name: Crypto Mining Simulator
description: Realistic Mining simulator with custom builds & mechanics! A lot of GPUs, CPUs, Motherboards, RAMs, SSDs, PSUs and more! Build your dream farm with 1000+ GPUs!

name: Undying Dusk
description:
Undying Dusk is a video game in a PDF format, with a gameplay based on exploration and logic puzzles, in the tradition of dungeon crawlers.

Featuring:

* ~ 200 000 PDF pages
* retro aesthetics: 160x120 resolution & a 16 colors palette
* grid-based world with 50+ distinct tiles & 10 maps to explore
* more than 30 treasure items, weapons & spells to pick up in order to face 15 enemy monsters
* 20 music tracks
* thousands of "Game Over" pages, and a single path to victory
* 4 hidden secrets & a concealed epilogue
* an online hall of fame

This is the very first video game in a PDF format.

name: Blue Fish and Underwater Worlds
description: Little Blue Fish swimming through underwater worlds trying to eat and not get eaten. The more Blue Fish grows, avoiding predators gets more difficult. Adventure, survival, crabs, squids, sharks, jellyfishes, fishing hooks, pearls and mini underwater castles. Engaging 10 levels and relaxing music.

name: Cinemoji: Oscar
description: Make a journey in the history of the Oscar trying to guess the name of an Oscar winner film represented by the emojis. Don't forget to ask for help!

name: Kawaii Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Judgment
description: A remastered version of Judgment, featuring faster loading times, 60 FPS, as well as all of the downloadable content from the original release.

name: Hoops: Shut Up and Jam
description: A version of Barkley: Shut Up and Jam without the player's license.

name: Hoops: Shut Up and Jam 2
description: A version of Barkley: Shut Up and Jam 2 without the player's license.

name: Asari Nanami's Star Fishing
description: Sin descripción

name: Micro Slaughter Community Project
description:
Micro Slaughter Community Project (MSCP for short) is an eighteen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports. The project was led by Bauul and was aimed at creating a set of short and accessible slaughter maps with a par time of five minutes. The WAD uses textures from the OTEX texture set.

It was released on the Doomworld forums on January 28, 2021, and was uploaded to the idgames archive on April 23, 2021. The mapset received an honorable mention at the 2021 Cacowards.

name: 9-nine-: New Episode
description: Enjoy short after stories for the heroines of the 9-nine- series in 9-nine-:NewEpisode!

name: Good Morning Hon
description: Sin descripción

name: Game Grumps: Joint Justice - Turnabout Hour
description:
Meet your favorite YouTube duo in an intense
Ace Attorney-like game! Someone stole the 10
Minute Power Hour dinos, and only Arin & Dan
can figure out the culprit of this heinous crime
and save their friend Jory!

name: The Attendant
description: Flight 155's landing gear has jammed and it's stuck in limbo, burning fuel ahead of an emergency landing. As flight attendant Evie, you can learn about your passengers, and about yourself, as you ease their fears during the crisis.

name: Solar Blaster: Challenge Stage
description:
The Earth is under attack from the invading alien war machine! Take control of the Solar Blaster fighter ship and strike back!

An action packed space shooter where you’ve got 2 minutes to get the high score.

name: Chickenman
description: Be Chickenman and punch those sheep! Old fashioned arcady fun!

name: Hentai Princess
description: Welcome to the world of charming princesses! This game will give you a lot of positive emotions! Solve puzzles, undress royal ladies, enjoy beautiful art and steamy animations!

name: Shots Fired in the Dark Forest
description: You have to open doors, use teleports, dodge saws and shoot at intelligent hostile plants.

name: Ghost or Trick
description: This game is a novel adventure game where the player becomes the assistant of Arthur, a detective, and solves mysteries. This time, you have to investigate the ghost that has appeared at the villa. Arthur is waiting for your help. Let's head to the villa as soon as possible.

name: Winter Wastelands
description: Winter Wastelands is a sci-fi fantasy action-adventure game about fighting bosses, exploring unique locations, gathering items that come with different costumes and special abilities, and trying to make it back home.

name: Crazy Race
description: Crazy Race is a fast-paced arcade racing game with low poly graphics and great physics.

name: Road Trip
description: Set in the southern cascades of northern California, Road Trip is a short game about exploration, community, landscapes, and family. Play as the Otter who is out looking for their grandmother, a legend of the Cascades who has made a name in the region but is a mystery to the main character.

name: Dark Frame
description: Simple platformer in a dark setting

name: Little Adventure
description: Little Adventure is a 2D platformer adventure game with beautiful graphics. You have to play as an assistant to the blacksmith named Ben and, together with the blacksmith, go to the castle to the king to give the legendary sword! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of danger and adventure!

name: Vojo
description: Vojo - is a casual game in which you move forward through a tunnel. You need to avoid obstacles that appear in your path, and collect white cubes for which you get points. How many points can you collect?

name: ZeroChance
description: We try to survive by killing the creatures we encounter in each level.

name: Noren
description: Noren is a simple key finder game. The map of the game consists of several different regions and some of these regions have special game mechanics except for finding keys

name: Sol Dorado Heist
description: Choose your path and solve the mystery of the Sol Dorado Heist!

name: Wild Wild Chess
description: The classical game of chess... now played in the Wild West! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be the wildest gunslinger in the old west!

name: Underland: The Climb
description: Use the elements of the scenery, such as picks and many others to drill the soil to the indicated location. Destructive terrain, fluid mechanics and the laws of physics must be handled correctly to solve the puzzles. Escape the city of Underland!

name: The Wave Story
description: A totally mysterious and enigmatic game, can you discover the end of this story?

name: Waifu Impact
description: Waifu Impact is a third person shooter, immersive single-player game in a paradisiac deserted island. Find all the stars and unlock the 6 beautiful girls! Increase your affinity with the girls defeating your enemies with them and then check out the gallery to see what they have for you!

name: Dark Chronicles: The Soul Reaver
description: Play a thrilling hidden object adventure, free the tortured souls and find out what mysteries a peaceful village is hiding.

name: My Sweet Ants!
description: My Sweet Ants! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Ants. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Fisherman Classic
description: Welcome to Fishy Archipelago! Go fishing, catalog your most rare fishes and sea creatures, buy and find skins, hats, boats and properties. Build your fishy empire. The retro world is yours!

name: 狗蛋神冒险: 很傻很天真
description: A "very silly very naive" dog egg game

name: EyeRoll
description: You are the glass eye of a very forgetful explorer and you must solve the long lost secrets of an ancient ruin to find your way out of the maze. The genre is fantasy puzzle solving while rolling a glass eye through a maze. Discover forgotten secrets in a lost world behind the Bermuda Triangle.

name: Itsutsu no Neito
description: A free single-player RPG that you can enjoy from start to finish! A hearty story with an in -depth battle system!

name: I'm a King
description: Role-playing strategy "I'm a King". Rule the kingdom, decide the fate of people, investigate, survive during periods of dark storms. This is only a small part of what you have to do.

name: Colorado Cocoa Club
description: A Yuri comedy set on the picturesque alpine Aspen slopes of Colorado, featuring a charming and hilarious storyline with girl x girl love in the snow.

name: Farming Engine
description: Can you build the farm of your dreams? Grow plants, feed your animals, ride your horse, craft tools and constructions, and explore the map! Become the best farmer of your town in this simulation game.

name: Night Wanderings
description: "Night Wanderings" is a classic 2D arcade shooter game with tons of enemies and settlements you need to defend!

name: Dark Sheep
description: Dark Sheep is a block-pushing puzzle game with horror elements, and a love letter to the Commodore 64. Classic Sokoban, new twists. Throughout the game, you'll be accompanied by a soundtrack created with genuine 1989 technology.

name: Think About Aliens!
description: Help Daði rescue Gagnamagnið and defeat the music hating aliens in this platformer/rhythm game. This game tells an exclusive story that takes place in between the "Think About Things" and "10 Years" music videos with original music from Daði Freyr, hidden characters and all original artwork.

name: Fate of Dynasty
description: A short lore exploration puzzle game inspired by walking simulators such as Gone Home, Dear Esther, and Layers of Fear.

name: Alone in the Office
description: You will play as office worker who was left to finish the job. While working on last documents you starting hearing strange sounds. How could this be? You are pretty sure that you are alone in the office.

name: ASMR Lightness: Light painting
description: ASMR LIGHTness uses AI (Artificial Intelligence) to recognize shapes in sandbox mode, and ASMR sounds/music reduce stress and let you relax, also ASMR LIGHTness can be just an atmospheric puzzle game with 60 levels.

name: Happy Hoarder
description: Happy hoarder is an addictive and happy looking catch game! Collect the falling items, stay away from the traps! Increase your score and unlock new levels and cosmetic items.

name: Cookies
description:
Where the ordinary and the hard-to-believe meet in a gutter, the population of "The Darb" simply call it "home". Gang violence, poverty, and substance abuse leave Darby rife with drifters, murderers, and cash maniacs whose sole purpose in life is finding the next high or die trying. The town of the same name exists as a swollen, caustic juxtaposition of Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas and reruns of Twin Peaks gestating in the sweltering heat of Southern Florida.

The optimistically named Orange Grove Houses, a dilapidated flop house of an apartment building where the only thing more parasitic than the rats and roaches are the tenants, squats obscenely at the end of a long abandoned housing development. A lone drug pusher hawks his wares to sun-deprived addicts when he's not falling prey to his own stock. After an especially odd trip, he finds himself tangled in a devil's weave of crime and hallucinations in halls that even God has given up on.

Inspired by black comedy Trash Humpers and VHS slashers like The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Cookies is an obscene PSX-coated blend of Satanic cults, meth-dealing clowns and online torture chambers, all under the same backwards-ass roof.

name: Sparkles & Gems
description: Two characters face head-to-head using their paddle and ball to shatter colour-matching gems and cascade rocks down on their opponent. Collect items and level up in Treasure Mode. Play through a visual novel-esque Story Mode. Or battle with a friend in 2P Mode!

name: A Vacation in Nebula
description: A short exploration game by Frogge in which players are invited to explore the Nebula Resort. Developed for rpgmaker.net's 1.44 Floppy Disc Event.

name: Koliquest
description:
Koliquest is an interactive Twitch game. The chat controls the game and helps the little bird to pass obstacles and survive as long as possible. Not only obstacles will challenge you but also so called quizmonsters will cross your way to ask a question to your chat. Only if the chat reacts fast enough Kolibri will survive.

Define your own questions or adjust the speed of the main character in order to create an individual experience for your chat. A great way to integrate the chat. How long will you survive?

name: Trails and Traces: The Tomb of Thomas Tew
description: Use your sleuthing skill and any means necessary to uncover information. Point-and-click adventure inspired by the classics. Megaphone tap unsuspecting people for clues. Original soundtrack and jukebox mode.

name: LudoNarraCon Supporter Pack featuring Cyrano
description:
A promotional pack for LudoNarraCon 2021, featuring the exclusive game Cyrano, along with a selection of wallpapers and a compilation album of music from the convention's exhibitors.

This one hour adaptation of the classic stage play, Cyrano de Bergerac, invites you to fight with blades and wits. Cyrano is the greatest swordsman and wordsmith in all of France. He also has the largest nose and the fiercest temper. He has stood alone against a hundred soldiers and can best the wits of any poet alive, but when he falls in love with Roxane, he is hopeless. How could she ever love such a ridiculous nose? When Roxane falls for a beautiful young soldier, Cyrano sees an opportunity to share his heart but hide his face.

name: Dungholes
description: Find all Diamonds in this Top Down Dungeon game. Can you get them all ? Over 60+ dangerous levels are waiting for you. And it requires all your skills: - Be fast sometimes - Think about the right way you need to choose Features: - 60+ Levels full of Diamonds, Keys and Traps - Handmade Pixel Art - Easy Gameplay but hard to master

name: Katja's Abyss: Tactics
description: A turn-based tactics game with pixel graphics and procedurally generated levels with minesweeping mechanics. Dig through caves, collecting and managing resources, and fend off monsters in turn-based combat.

name: SJ-19 Learns to Love!
description: SJ-19 Learns to Love is a short metroidvania about a killer robot who learns to love~  Explore, defeat bosses, and gain the power of LOVE!

name: Battle Axe: Badge Edition
description:
Inspired by the classic adventure games of the 80s & 90s, Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg. Battle Axe features high quality visuals, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

Battle Axe Badge Edition includes a exclusive pin badges set.

name: Jaleco Collection 1
description:
The ‘Jaleco Collection 1’ cartridge for Evercade includes 10 classic games including: Bases Loaded, Astyanax, Brawl Brothers, City Connection, and Rival Turf!

Full Games Included:
- Bases Loaded
- Astyanax
- Brawl Brothers
- City Connection
- Earth Defence Force
- Super Goal! 2
- Totally Rad
- Rival Turf
- Operation Logic Bomb
- Ignition Factor

name: Piko Interactive Collection 2
description:
The ‘Piko Interactive’ Collection 2 Cartridge for Evercade includes 13 classic sports and racing games featuring: Hoops: Shut Up and Jam, Beast Ball, Top Racer 2, Soccer Kid, and Racing Fever!

This bundle includes:
- Power Football
- Hoops, Shut Up and Jam
- Hoops: Shut Up and Jam 2
- Summer Challenge
- Winter Challenge
- Beast Ball
- Eliminator Boat Duel
- Full Throttle All American Racing
- Top Racer 2
- Soccer Kid
- Racing Fever
- World Trophy Soccer
- Football Madness

name: Fleeting Iris
description: Ayame is a beautiful girl from Japan that is living a carefree life in search of happiness. One fateful day, she met Robert, a CIA agent who was in Japan during a mission. They become engaged and move to America together. However, not all is as happy as it seems as her past comes back to haunt her.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Hacked
description:
Version 4.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Everlasting Flames arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Haxxor Bunny (Bronie)
• New Story Chapter XXIII: The Solo Stage
• New Featured Event: Arc: Light Bound
• ...and more!

name: Scarecrow Co-op 2
description: Cleanse a forest with your friends.

name: Tokeijikake no Apocalypse
description: This is a Japanese visual novel in which the "box of the future" has opened. Follow the protagonist as she continues to search for a bit of happiness repeated time.

name: Mario's Keep Co-op
description: A co-op version of Mario's Keep, a Super Mario Bros. puzzle ROM hack.

name: The Life of Saint Fiona Bianco Xena
description:
In the rubble of the Syxtercian cathedral you find 3 shell vials containing experimental hormones harvested from slugs. They used to belong to Saint Fiona Bianco Xena - Mother of the Motherless, patron saint of the voiceless.

You hear distant whispers, entangled with the melted beats of early Molluscwave. They tell the story of many wounds and many adventures : flesh consumed by a rare blue speckled gutter slug, bioplastic mixed with piss under the light of a half moon, crystal eyes winking provocatively at the face of God, children saved and revolutions lost.

name: Quest of Wizard
description: Quest of Wizard is a classic Action Platformer set in a fantasy setting. Go through difficult levels full of dangerous traps and different enemies, fight with bosses, look for chests with gold, open secrets, learn and upgrade spells.

name: ARD: Anomalous Research Department
description:
In the basement of a local community college, a forgotten computer sits.

The last relic of the Anomalous Research Department.

What was their purpose? What did they find?

Was it the solution? Or was it the cause?

name: Raiden IV x Mikado Remix: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
- Game: Raiden IV x Mikado Remix
- Background Music and Soundtrack CD
- Reprint Original Soundtrack CD "Raiden IV -Ultimate of Raiden-"
- Reversible Cover

name: Zombrero
description: A lone gunman defending his last stand in the desert heat

name: Serenity at Dusk
description:
Here is where a heavy heart asks for rest.
Jackie Huang learns more about the clients that carry a heavy past who frequent the shop for a little sleep therapy. This 4-month project that serves as both a visual development and motion graphic school project invites you into the mysterious yet magical world of Dr. Feng’s apothecary.

name: Lil Flutie 3D: Director's Pandemic Edition
description: A weird 3D PSX platformer

name: LSDriver 1+2: Remastered Collection
description: LSDriver 1 + 2 is a compilation of 2 racing games with real physics and ragdoll style characters that lose parts of their bodies, have fun trying to complete very crazy tracks.

name: Hunting Simulator 2: A Ranger's Life
description: In this new scripted campaign, join Dexter in his daily duties as a forest ranger.

name: 1 Hop
description: Play as a rabbit and go looking for carrots and food bags avoiding the dog. Try to get the mountain first to become the ultimate rabbit, play split screen with your friend and work together to become the King Rabbit.

name: Kitty Cat Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 101 Loco
description: The DB BR 101 is a classic among the modern electric locomotives of Germany, with heritage spanning some of the nation's most revolutionary designs and continuing the honour by working throughout the Deutsche Bahn network every day. Experience this icon for yourself in Train Sim World 2!

name: DW
description: A story-focused adventure RPG about a boy stranded in a world full of drawings. Explore your way out, help others, and use your disguises and tricks to overcome any obstacles in your way.

name: Avoid the Demons
description: Welcome to hell with Avoid The Demons. Demons that come from all sides. This is a dangerous arena and your goal is to survive for as long as possible.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Pepe
description: Pepe is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Xiao Junguang
description: Xiao Junguang is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Taichi Nakanishi
description: Taichi Nakanishi is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Stone River
description: Because of the tornado, you are blown to a mysterious island, which is full of crisis and unknown. Exploring this island is still your only chance to survive. In this new environment, you will be tested and constantly remind yourself how close you are to death.

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 101
description: The DB BR 101 is a classic among the modern electric locomotives of Germany, with heritage spanning some of the nation's most revolutionary designs and continuing the honour by working throughout the Deutsche Bahn network every day. Experience this icon for yourself in Train Sim World 2!

name: Eviron's Chronicles
description: Eviron's Chronicle - a free collectible card game with elements of RPG. Under your command will be six commanders capable of engaging in battle, hundreds of cards that can be improved and developed. With this might you’ll pave the way to the heights of glory and power!Eviron waits you!

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ
description: "Sky Goddess Ⅱ" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images.

name: Vylan
description: Vylan is a 100 level tile-based platformer about beating each level under a certain amount of time.

name: Horny Honey
description: Horny Honey is a great choice to expand the collection in your library! We present you a fascinating hentai puzzle with a wide variety of pictures, in which everyone will find something to their liking!

name: Master of Magic: Caster of Magic for Windows
description: Caster of Magic, the community update to the classic Master of Magic, is brought to the modern era with Caster of Magic for Windows.

name: Craft the Mapcrafter: Gathering Magic Words
description: An RPG where you gather words while travelling in a fantasy world.

name: Paleon
description: Your time machine is broken. And it looks like you are stuck in the past. Try to create your own civilization and return home!

name: House Cleaning Survival
description: "House Cleaning Survival" is a satisfying cleaning simulation game. One day, our freshly unemployed main protagonist receives a message from a strange character, asking for...house cleaning? Complete cleaning orders to pay off your debt! Use all-powerful special cleaning equipment to conquer all filth!! - simple controls for fun cleaning! - many "unique" and "special" rooms wait for your makeover! - an intriguing story illustrated through casual conversation

name: Unou no Tatsujin: Machigai Sagashi Museum
description: Sin descripción

name: MagiGhostDeadline
description: The Magician has been cursed. In 10 days, her soul will be dragged into the underworld. Still, one hope remains. There exists a loophole which allows the cursed to exchange vast amounts of money for their souls. Help The Magician amass great wealth and avoid eternal damnation.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season Three
description: The Cold War heats up in Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season 3. Experience Verdansk in 1984 as Perseus' brainwashing scheme is revealed. With Wraith, a cold and calculated Perseus spy joining the fray, you're going to need plenty of backup. Fortunately, Season 3 delivers with new weaponry, Operator Skins, and Legendary Blueprints.

name: Shantae
description: The original Shantae adventure returns! First released in 2002, Shantae is the classic action-adventure-platformer that introduced players to the fan-favorite Half-Genie heroine. In her debut title, Shantae hair-whips, dances, and transforms as she seeks out four elemental stones hidden throughout Sequin Land to put a stop to the nefarious lady pirate, Risky Boots. During her quest, she'll explore treacherous labyrinths, gain amazing new powers, conquer mini-games, and meet up with friends such as Bolo, Sky, and Rottytops! This version of the game includes both the standard Game Boy Color mode and the Game Boy Advance-enhanced mode!

name: World End Economica Complete
description: In the far future on the moon, humans have begun to colonize it. A young boy named Haru has been chasing his wildest dream. His dream is to stand where no man has stood before, and in order to do so he needs capital, a ludicrous amount of capital. What better place to get that amount of capital by using the stock market? There are two key rules that govern the stock market. The first rule: Never take a loss. The second rule: Never forget the first. Only those who follow these rules are able to obtain enormous wealth... Finally, the 3 episodes of WORLD END ECONOMiCA are collected in one game, allowing you to enjoy the entire story!

name: Asobu Tights
description: The web animation "Miru Tights" by the popular illustrator "Yomu". The fresh and fetishistic tights anime is now available on Nintendo Switch as a puzzle game! You can meet Ren, Yua, Homi and Yuiko again at! ・It's a 3-match puzzle game with easy controls. ・There are 15 stage levels, and special effects for clearing all stages! ・You can use the points you accumulate to redeem your collection! ・All you can see is the animation and illustrations, including new illustrations by the original author! ・The game is available in English and Chinese (simplified and traditional) as well as Japanese!

name: Skyland Rush: Air Raid Attack
description: A shooting rush game against creatures of the dark! Shoot and fly through the sky of Skylandia in an epic adventure. How far can you get? Dash into the world and challenge your skills in this side-scrolling game! Features: - Shoot as many creatures as possible to increase your score - Use powerful charms to upgrade your weapons - Beware of puzzling traps in your skyway - Explore action-packed game blocks of elevating difficulty - Complete challenging missions and claim the rewards - Brace yourself, Guardians may toughen your journey - Collect egglings to unlock "Awakening" and to meet the Titans Evil has taken over Skylandia! Zenya needs your help! Survive the sneaky attacks of various bugsters, ominous witches, robobirds, little devils and other notorious monsters that will threaten your mission! Shoot'em up to clear your way and claim the rewards. A long journey lies ahead, dark times shall not prevail! Tap and balance though dense vegetation, blocking rocks and dangerous caves! Collect powerful charms to wipe out all the enemy creatures with your super weapons. Avoid or smash the obstacles and spot the hidden traps ahead so that you can disable them in time. During your epic adventures, different types of egglings will come across your path! Each one of them is an ill-omen of an evil presence! Collect them all while monstrous Titans await to be awakened! Join Zenya's journey to the adventurous Skylandia!

name: Mystic Fate
description: Help young Aris to solve the mystery of the fall of Asfand and It’s guild of alchemists, avenge the death of her brother, discover the limits of her powers all of that and more inside a 3D voxel action adventure game where you control weapons made of metal. Aris has been training for all her life due to her special powers and skills along with her brother to go inside the Alchemists Dungeon and recover the long lost orbs to restore the peace in Asfand long thrilled by Koltors which after the fall of the alchemists guild has been winning the war. Recovering the orbs means Aris will have to discover what happened to her world many generations ago. Features - Play as Aris and control her powers over Coins and Swords master them and Fly over the Alchemists dungeon. - Get to know all the History THrough many NPCs and Collect all the Scrolls to know exactly what happened to Asfand. - Enjoy the Detailed Environment and rich enemy variety.

name: War of Stealth Assassin
description: It is stealth action, top-down shooter with armed soldiers and zombies which has sci fi style and rude and rectilinear humor. You play for a soldier who must come in to a secret base and take information about they work. But the main hero doesn`t expected that a base has many secrets from which blood getting cold in veins. The game is gived thrills with possibility to play by quite and stealth but also you can shoot if you ready to it.

name: Escaping a Kid's Room: The Adventures of Nyanzou & Kumakichi - Escape Game Series
description: Once upon a time, there were two Stuffed Animal Fairies: Nyanzou and Kumakichi. These two were always playing with each other. As usual, the two hang out, having fun. But a pair of suspicious eyes are found lurking in the shadows, staring at them………. Nyanzou and Kumakichi get trapped in a room by a shady ghost. Solve puzzles and help them escape. It's your standard escape game, on the easy side, and highly recommended for beginners. It comes with autosave, hints, and memo functions.

name: Picross S6
description:
The 6th Picross in the S Series is perfect for a relaxing puzzle challenge! Picross is a picture crossword puzzle game where you follow hint numbers to complete a picture.
With simple, easy-to-follow rules, it's a game anyone can play!

name: Demonsions: Industry
description: Demonsions: Industry is an open-world, procedurally generated factory builder game. Everything can be mined. Enjoy crafting, building, and fully automating your survival in this strange world full of wonders and hidden dangers.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: The Lost Gods
description: Experience a new top-down exploration perspective and brawler-style combat! Meet a new hero, Ash, embarking on an epic journey to reunite the Greek gods.

name: Typing Quest
description: Play and learn with the first typing game for Switch! According to new educational guidelines, programming became a required subject in elementary school starting in 2020. And while the focus tends to be on the programs, typing is the equivalent of holding a pencil to learn writing for children who are using a computer for the first time. Being able to look up while accurately inputting keystrokes during class is the equivalent of looking at the blackboard while writing notes. And since you are going to be learning, why not improve your skills while playing on a game console?

name: QuickSpot: Master of the Right Brain
description: Train your right bright with spot the difference puzzles in QuickSpot: Master of the Right Brain, a "spot the difference action" game playable solo or with friends.
